question: What is Iyer's record against Hazlewood?
query: SELECT T2."player_name", SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS "total_runs", COUNT(T1."delivery_id") AS "balls_faced", SUM(CASE WHEN T1."player_out_id" = T1."striker_id" AND T1."wicket_type" NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field', 'retired out') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "dismissals" FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1."striker_id" = T2."player_id" INNER JOIN Players AS T3 ON T1."bowler_id" = T3."player_id" WHERE T2."player_name" LIKE '%Iyer' AND T3."player_name" LIKE '%Hazlewood' GROUP BY T2."player_name"
question_english: What is Iyer's record against Hazlewood?
question_hindi_1: Hazlewood के खिलाफ़ Iyer का रिकॉर्ड क्या है?
question_hindi_2: Hazlewood के खिलाफ़ Iyer का रिकॉर्ड कैसा है?
question_telugu_1: Hazlewood ఎదురుగా Iyer రికార్డు ఎలా ఉంది?
question_punjabi: Hazlewood ਦੇ ਖਿਲਾਫ Iyer ਦਾ ਰਿਕਾਰਡ ਕਿਵੇਂ ਏ

question: List Shepherd's stats in overs 19-20 while batting(runs, balls, dismissals, strike rate, fours and sixes)
query:
SELECT
  SUM(T1.runs_scored) AS "Runs",
  COUNT(T1.delivery_id) AS "Balls",
  SUM(CASE WHEN T1.player_out_id = T2.player_id THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Dismissals",
  SUM(CASE WHEN T1.runs_scored = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Fours",
  SUM(CASE WHEN T1.runs_scored = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Sixes",
  CAST(SUM(T1.runs_scored) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.delivery_id) AS "Strike_Rate"
FROM Deliveries AS T1
INNER JOIN Players AS T2
  ON T1.striker_id = T2.player_id
WHERE
  T2.player_name LIKE 'R Shepherd%' AND T1.over_number >= 18 AND NOT (
    T1.extra_runs > 0 AND T1.runs_scored = 0 AND T1.wicket_type IS NULL
  );
question_english: List Shepherd's stats in overs 19-20 while batting(runs, balls, dismissals, strike rate, fours and sixes)
question_hindi_1: Shepherd के ओवर 19-20 में बल्लेबाज़ी के आंकड़े बताएं (रन, गेंदें, आउट, स्ट्राइक रेट, चौके और छक्के)।
question_telugu_1: Shepherd కి ఓవర్ 19-20 లో బాటింగ్ స్టాటస్ ఏమిటి(పరుగులు, బంతులు, అవుట్, స్ట్రైక్ రేట్, ఫోర్లు, సిక్సులు)
question_punjabi: Shepherd ਦੇ ਓਵਰ  19-20  ਵਿਚ ਬੱਲੇਬਾਜ਼ੀ ਦੇ ਆਂਕੜੇ  ਦੱਸੋ  (ਰਨ , ਗੇਂਦਾ , ਆਊਟ , ਸਤ੍ਰੀਕੇ ਰੇਟ , ਚੌਕੇ ਤੇ ਛਕੇ )।

question: List all batsmen with at least 1000 runs against any team in ipl.
query:
SELECT
  "striker",
  CASE
    WHEN "bowling_team" = 'Deccan Chargers'
    OR "bowling_team" = 'Sunrisers Hyderabad' THEN 'Hyderabad'
    WHEN "bowling_team" = 'Delhi Daredevils'
    OR "bowling_team" = 'Delhi Capitals' THEN 'Delhi'
    WHEN "bowling_team" = 'Kings XI Punjab'
    OR "bowling_team" = 'Punjab Kings' THEN 'Punjab'
    WHEN "bowling_team" = 'Pune Warriors'
    OR "bowling_team" = 'Rising Pune Supergiant'
    OR "bowling_team" = 'Rising Pune Supergiants' THEN 'Pune'
    ELSE "bowling_team"
  END AS Opponent,
  SUM("runs_scored") AS TotalRuns
FROM "Deliveries"
GROUP BY
  "striker",
  Opponent
HAVING
  SUM("runs_scored") >= 1000
ORDER BY
  TotalRuns DESC;
answer: [('V Kohli', 'Punjab', 1159), ('V Kohli', 'Chennai Super Kings', 1146), ('DA Warner', 'Punjab', 1134), ('V Kohli', 'Delhi', 1130), ('V Kohli', 'Hyderabad', 1116), ('DA Warner', 'Kolkata Knight Riders', 1093), ('RG Sharma', 'Kolkata Knight Riders', 1083), ('RG Sharma', 'Delhi', 1057), ('S Dhawan', 'Chennai Super Kings', 1057), ('V Kohli', 'Kolkata Knight Riders', 1021)]
question_english: List all batsmen with at least 1000 runs against any team in ipl.

question: how many players have taken 20+ wickets for all punjab franchises in an ipl edition, list them with number of wickets taken by them
query: SELECT T3.player_name, T2.season, COUNT(T1.delivery_id) AS wickets_taken FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Matches AS T2 ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id INNER JOIN Players AS T3 ON T1.bowler_id = T3.player_id WHERE (CASE WHEN T1.bowling_team IN ('Kings XI Punjab','Punjab Kings') THEN 'Punjab Kings' ELSE T1.bowling_team END)='Punjab Kings' AND T1.wicket_type IS NOT NULL AND T1.wicket_type NOT IN ('run out','retired hurt','obstructing the field','retired out') GROUP BY T2.season, T3.player_name HAVING wickets_taken>=20 ORDER BY wickets_taken DESC;
question_english: how many players have taken 20+ wickets for all punjab franchises in an ipl edition, list them with number of wickets taken by them

question: which player(s) have been the part playing eleven of most ipl finals wins?(list the top 5 of ranked)
query: WITH PlayerFinalWins AS (SELECT T3."player_name", COUNT(T1."match_id") AS wins FROM "Matches" AS T1 JOIN "PlayerInMatch" AS T2 ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" JOIN "Players" AS T3 ON T2."player_id" = T3."player_id" WHERE T1."stage" = 'Final' AND T1."match_winner" = T2."team_name" GROUP BY T3."player_name"), RankedPlayerWins AS (SELECT "player_name", wins, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY wins DESC) AS rnk FROM PlayerFinalWins) SELECT "player_name", wins FROM RankedPlayerWins WHERE rnk <= 5 ORDER BY wins DESC
question_english: which player(s) have been the part playing eleven of most ipl finals wins?(list the top 5 of ranked)
question_hindi_1: कौन से खिलाड़ी सबसे ज़्यादा बार IPL फाइनल जीतने वाली टीम की प्लेइंग इलेवन का हिस्सा रहे हैं? (शीर्ष 5 खिलाड़ियों की सूची दें)

question: Which ipl season had the highest runs scored per over and how much was it?
query: SELECT T2.season, CAST(SUM(T1.runs_scored + T1.extra_runs) AS REAL) * 6 / COUNT(T1.delivery_id) AS runs_per_over FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Matches AS T2 ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id GROUP BY T2.season ORDER BY runs_per_over DESC LIMIT 1
question_english: Which ipl season had the highest runs scored per over and how much was it?

question: How many matches have been won by mumbai in ahmedabad?List both the teams with their scores.
query:
WITH TeamScores AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "batting_team",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS total_runs
  FROM "Deliveries"
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "batting_team"
)
SELECT
  T1."batting_team" AS "Team1",
  T1.total_runs AS "Team1_Score",
  T2."batting_team" AS "Team2",
  T2.total_runs AS "Team2_Score"
FROM "Matches" AS M
JOIN TeamScores AS T1
  ON M."match_id" = T1."match_id" AND M."team1" = T1."batting_team"
JOIN TeamScores AS T2
  ON M."match_id" = T2."match_id" AND M."team2" = T2."batting_team"
WHERE
  M."city" = 'Ahmedabad' AND M."match_winner" = 'Mumbai Indians';

question_telugu_1: అహ్మదాబాద్ లో ముంబై ఎన్ని మ్యాచ్‌లు గెలిచింది? రెండు టీములు మరియు వారి పరుగులు రాయండి.
question_punjabi: ਮੁੰਬਈ ਨੇ ਅਹਿਮਦਾਬਾਦ ਵਿੱਚ ਕਿੰਨੇ ਮੈਚ ਜਿੱਤੇ ਹਨ? ਦੋਵਾਂ ਟੀਮਾਂ ਦੇ ਨਾਮ ਉਹਨਾਂ ਦੇ ਸਕੋਰਾਂ ਸਮੇਤ ਦੱਸੋ।

question: List the most sixes hit by a punjab batter in a season.
query:
SELECT
  T3."player_name",
  T2."season",
  COUNT(T1."delivery_id") AS "number_of_sixes"
FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T3
  ON T1."striker_id" = T3."player_id"
WHERE
  T1."batting_team" IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings') AND T1."runs_scored" = 6
GROUP BY
  T2."season",
  T3."player_name"
ORDER BY
  "number_of_sixes" DESC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: List the most sixes hit by a punjab batter in a season.
question_hindi_1: एक सीज़न में पंजाब के किसी बल्लेबाज़ द्वारा लगाए गए सबसे ज़्यादा छक्कों की सूची दें।
question_telugu_1: ఒక సీజన్ లో పంజాబ్ బ్యాటర్ అత్యాధికంగా కొట్టిన సిక్సులు రాయండి.

question: List the matches in which bumrah went wicketless.
query: SELECT T1.venue, T1.match_date FROM Matches AS T1 INNER JOIN PlayerInMatch AS T2 ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id INNER JOIN Players AS T3 ON T2.player_id = T3.player_id WHERE T3.player_name = 'JJ Bumrah' AND T1.match_id NOT IN (SELECT T4.match_id FROM Deliveries AS T4 INNER JOIN Players AS T5 ON T4.bowler_id = T5.player_id WHERE T5.player_name = 'JJ Bumrah' AND T4.wicket_type IS NOT NULL AND T4.wicket_type NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field', 'retired out')) ORDER BY T1.match_date DESC LIMIT 5

question: Out of bowlers who have played atleat 50 matches, list the bowlers who have the most instances of taking atleast one wicket in a match.
query: SELECT T2.player_name, COUNT(T1.match_id) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT match_id, bowler_id FROM Deliveries WHERE wicket_type IS NOT NULL AND wicket_type NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field', 'retired out')) AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1.bowler_id = T2.player_id WHERE T1.bowler_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM PlayerInMatch GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(match_id) >= 50) GROUP BY T2.player_name ORDER BY COUNT(T1.match_id) DESC LIMIT 5
question_english: Out of bowlers who have played atleat 50 matches, list the bowlers who have the most instances of taking atleast one wicket in a match.
question_hindi_1: कम से कम 50 मैच खेल चुके गेंदबाज़ों में से, उन गेंदबाज़ों के नाम बताएँ जिन्होंने सबसे ज़्यादा मैचों में कम से कम एक विकेट लिया है।

question: List all instances of a knockout match where a team scored 200+ but none of the players scored a half century.
query: SELECT T2."match_date", T2."venue", T1."batting_team", SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") AS "total_runs" FROM "Deliveries" AS T1 INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T2 ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" WHERE T2."stage" != 'Group' GROUP BY T1."match_id", T1."inning", T1."batting_team" HAVING SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") >= 200 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM "Deliveries" AS D2 WHERE D2."match_id" = T1."match_id" AND D2."inning" = T1."inning" GROUP BY D2."striker_id" HAVING SUM(D2."runs_scored") >= 50) ORDER BY T2."match_date" DESC
question_english: List all instances of a knockout match where a team scored 200+ but none of the players scored a half century.

question: Who was the leading run-getter in death overs of ipl 2025?List his runs in this phase and the balls played in the phase.
query: SELECT T3."player_name", SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS "total_runs", COUNT(T1."delivery_id") AS "balls_played" FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Matches AS T2 ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" INNER JOIN Players AS T3 ON T1."striker_id" = T3."player_id" WHERE T2."season" = '2025' AND T1."over_number" >= 16 GROUP BY T3."player_name" ORDER BY "total_runs" DESC LIMIT 1;

question_telugu_1: IPL 2025 డెత్ ఓవర్స్ లో అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ పరుగులు ఎవరు చేశారు? ఈ ఫేజ్లో వారి పరుగులు మరియు బంతులు సంఖ్య రాయండి.

question: List all IPL playoff matches with total runs over 400.
query:
SELECT
  T1.season,
  T1.match_date,
  T1.venue,
  T1.team1,
  T1.team2,
  SUM(T2.runs_scored + T2.extra_runs) AS total_runs
FROM Matches AS T1
JOIN Deliveries AS T2
  ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id
WHERE
  T1.stage <> 'Group'
GROUP BY
  T1.match_id
HAVING
  total_runs > 400
ORDER BY
  total_runs DESC
LIMIT 5;
answer: ('2025', '2025-05-30', 'Maharaja Yadavindra Singh International Cricket Stadium, New Chandigarh', 'Mumbai Indians', 'Gujarat Titans', 436)
question_english: List all IPL playoff matches with total runs over 400.
question_hindi_1: उन सभी IPL प्लेऑफ़ मैचों की सूची बनाएँ जिनमें कुल 400 से ज़्यादा रन बने।
question_telugu_1: 400 కన్నా ఎక్కువ పరుగులు ఉన్న అన్నీ IPL ప్లేఆఫ్ మ్యాచ్‌లురాయండి.
question_punjabi: IPL ਦੇ ਉਹਨਾਂ ਸਾਰੇ ਪਲੇਅ-ਔਫ ਮੈਚਾਂ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਦਿਓ ਜਿਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਵਿੱਚ ਕੁੱਲ ਰਨ 400 ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਸਨ।

question: Show players who scored more than 750 runs in a single IPL season.
query:
SELECT
  T3."player_name",
  T2."season",
  SUM(T1."runs_scored")
FROM Deliveries AS T1
INNER JOIN Matches AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
INNER JOIN Players AS T3
  ON T1."striker_id" = T3."player_id"
GROUP BY
  T2."season",
  T3."player_name"
HAVING
  SUM(T1."runs_scored") > 750
ORDER BY
  SUM(T1."runs_scored") DESC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: Show players who scored more than 750 runs in a single IPL season.
question_hindi_1: ऐसे खिलाड़ी दिखाओ जिन्होंने किसी एक IPL सीज़न में 750 से ज़्यादा रन बनाए हों।
question_hindi_2: उन खिलाड़ियों के नाम बताइए जिन्होंने एक IPL सीज़न में 750 से अधिक रन बनाए हैं।

question_telugu_1: 750 కంటే ఎక్కువ పరుగులు ఒక IPL సీజన్లో ఏ క్రీడాకార్లు చేశారు?
question_punjabi: ਉਹਨਾਂ ਖਿਡਾਰੀਆਂ ਦੇ ਨਾਮ ਦੱਸੋ ਜਿਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਨੇ ਇੱਕੋ IPL ਸੀਜ਼ਨ ਵਿੱਚ 750 ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਰਨ ਬਣਾਏ ਹਨ।

question: Show MI’s IPL playoff record when batting first and when fielding first.
query:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN (T1.toss_winner = 'Mumbai Indians' AND T1.toss_decision = 'bat') OR (T1.toss_winner <> 'Mumbai Indians' AND T1.toss_decision = 'field')
    THEN 'Batting First'
    ELSE 'Fielding First'
  END AS "MI_Action",
  COUNT(T1.match_id) AS "Matches_Played",
  SUM(CASE WHEN T1.match_winner = 'Mumbai Indians' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Wins",
  SUM(CASE WHEN T1.match_winner <> 'Mumbai Indians' AND T1.match_winner IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Losses"
FROM "Matches" AS T1
WHERE
  (T1.team1 = 'Mumbai Indians' OR T1.team2 = 'Mumbai Indians') AND T1.stage <> 'Group'
GROUP BY
  "MI_Action";
question_english: Show MI’s IPL playoff record when batting first and when fielding first.
question_hindi_1: MI का IPL प्लेऑफ़ में पहले बल्लेबाज़ी और पहले फ़ील्डिंग करने का रिकॉर्ड दिखाओ।
question_telugu_1: IPL ప్లేఆఫ్ మ్యాచూలులో MI మొదటి బాటింగ్ చేసినప్పుడు మరియు మొదటి బౌలింగ్ చేసినప్పుడు మ్యాచ్ల రికార్డులు రాయండి.
question_punjabi: ਪਹਿਲਾਂ ਬੱਲੇਬਾਜ਼ੀ ਕਰਨ ਵੇਲੇ ਅਤੇ ਪਹਿਲਾਂ ਫੀਲਡਿੰਗ ਕਰਨ ਵੇਲੇ MI ਦਾ IPL ਪਲੇਅ-ਔਫ ਰਿਕਾਰਡ ਦਿਖਾਓ।

question: Show Bumrah’s bowling stats in overs 7 to 15 in IPL 2025.
query:
SELECT
  SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") AS "Runs Conceded",
  COUNT(
    CASE
      WHEN T1."wicket_type" NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field') AND T1."player_out_id" IS NOT NULL
      THEN 1
    END
  ) AS "Wickets",
  CAST(COUNT(T1."delivery_id") AS REAL) / 6.0 AS "Overs Bowled",
  CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") AS REAL) * 6.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(T1."delivery_id"), 0) AS "Economy Rate",
  CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") AS REAL) / NULLIF(COUNT(
    CASE
      WHEN T1."wicket_type" NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field') AND T1."player_out_id" IS NOT NULL
      THEN 1
    END
  ), 0) AS "Average",
  CAST(COUNT(T1."delivery_id") AS REAL) / NULLIF(COUNT(
    CASE
      WHEN T1."wicket_type" NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field') AND T1."player_out_id" IS NOT NULL
      THEN 1
    END
  ), 0) AS "Strike Rate"
FROM Deliveries AS T1
INNER JOIN Matches AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
INNER JOIN Players AS T3
  ON T1."bowler_id" = T3."player_id"
WHERE
  T3."player_name" = 'JJ Bumrah' AND T2."season" = '2025' AND T1."over_number" BETWEEN 6 AND 14;
question_english: Show Bumrah’s bowling stats in overs 7 to 15 in IPL 2025.
question_hindi_1: IPL 2025 में, 7 से 15 ओवर के बीच Bumrah के गेंदबाज़ी के आँकड़े दिखाइए।
question_telugu_1: IPL 2025 లో 7 నుండి 15 ఓవర్ల మద్య Bumrah బౌలింగ్ గణాంకాలు చూబిచ్చంది.
question_punjabi: IPL 2025 ਵਿੱਚ 7 ਤੋਂ 15 ਓਵਰਾਂ ਦੇ ਵਿਚਕਾਰ Bumrah ਦੇ ਗੇਂਦਬਾਜ਼ੀ ਦੇ ਅੰਕੜੇ ਦਿਖਾਓ।

question: Among all bowlers with at least 3 overs in overs 7–15 in IPL 2025, find those with economy rate under 6.
query: SELECT T3."player_name", CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") AS REAL) * 6.0 / COUNT(T1."delivery_id") AS "economy_rate" FROM "Deliveries" AS T1 JOIN "Matches" AS T2 ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" JOIN "Players" AS T3 ON T1."bowler_id" = T3."player_id" WHERE T2."season" = '2025' AND T1."over_number" BETWEEN 6 AND 14 GROUP BY T1."bowler_id" HAVING COUNT(T1."delivery_id") >= 18 AND (CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") AS REAL) * 6.0 / COUNT(T1."delivery_id")) < 6 ORDER BY "economy_rate" ASC LIMIT 5
question_english: Among all bowlers with at least 3 overs in overs 7–15 in IPL 2025, find those with economy rate under 6.
question_hindi_1: IPL 2025 में 7 से 15 ओवर के बीच, कम से कम 3 ओवर फेंकने वाले उन गेंदबाज़ों का पता लगाएं जिनका इकॉनमी रेट 6 से कम है।
question_hindi_2: IPL 2025 में, उन सभी गेंदबाज़ों के नाम बताएं जिन्होंने 7 से 15 ओवर के बीच कम से कम 3 ओवर डाले हैं और जिनकी इकॉनमी 6 से कम रही है।
question_telugu_1: IPL 2025 లో 7 నుండి 15 ఓవర్ల మద్య కనీసం 3 ఓవర్ల ఉన్న క్రీడాకార్లలో ఎవరి డగ్గర ఎకానమీ రేట్ 6 కన్నా తక్కువ ఉంది?
question_punjabi: ਉਹਨਾਂ ਸਾਰੇ ਗੇਂਦਬਾਜ਼ਾਂ ਵਿੱਚੋਂ ਜਿਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਨੇ IPL 2025 ਵਿੱਚ 7-15 ਓਵਰਾਂ ਦੇ ਵਿਚਕਾਰ ਘੱਟੋ-ਘੱਟ 3 ਓਵਰ ਕੀਤੇ ਹਨ, ਉਹਨਾਂ ਦੇ ਨਾਮ ਦੱਸੋ ਜਿਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੀ ਇਕਾਨਮੀ ਰੇਟ  6 ਤੋਂ ਘੱਟ ਹੈ।

question: Show GT’s batting stats in overs 7 to 15 in IPL 2025 — total runs, run rate, wickets lost, average, and dot-ball percentage.
query: SELECT SUM(T1."runs_scored"), CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS REAL) * 6 / COUNT(T1."delivery_id"), COUNT(T1."player_out_id"), CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS REAL) / NULLIF(COUNT(T1."player_out_id"), 0), CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1."runs_scored" = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1."delivery_id") FROM "Deliveries" AS T1 INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T2 ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" WHERE T2."season" = '2025' AND T1."batting_team" = 'Gujarat Titans' AND T1."over_number" BETWEEN 6 AND 14
question_english: Show GT’s batting stats in overs 7 to 15 in IPL 2025 — total runs, run rate, wickets lost, average, and dot-ball percentage.
question_hindi_1: *IPL 2025 में ओवर 7 से 15 के बीच GT के बल्लेबाज़ी के आँकड़े दिखाओ — कुल रन, रन रेट, गिरे विकेट, औसत, और डॉट बॉल प्रतिशत।**
question_telugu_1: IPL 2025 లో 7 నుండి 15 ఓవర్ల మద్య GT బాటింగ్ గణాంకాలు చూబిచ్చంది - మొత్తం పరుగులు, పడిపోయిన విక్కెట్లు, ఆవెరేజ్ మరియు డాట్ బాల్ శాతం.
question_punjabi: IPL 2025 ਵਿੱਚ 7 ਤੋਂ 15 ਓਵਰਾਂ ਦੇ ਵਿਚਕਾਰ GT ਦੇ ਬੱਲੇਬਾਜ਼ੀ ਅੰਕੜੇ ਦਿਖਾਓ — ਕੁੱਲ ਰਨ, ਰਨ ਰੇਟ, ਡਿੱਗੀਆਂ ਵਿਕਟਾਂ, ਔਸਤ ਅਤੇ ਡਾਟ-ਬਾਲ ਪ੍ਰਤੀਸ਼ਤ।

question: Compare GT’s batting average and run rate in overs 7–15 with all other teams in IPL 2025.
query:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN T1."batting_team" = 'Gujarat Titans'
    THEN 'Gujarat Titans'
    ELSE 'Other Teams'
  END AS "team_category",
  CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS REAL) / NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1."player_out_id" IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END), 0) AS "batting_average",
  CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS REAL) * 6 / COUNT(T1."delivery_id") AS "run_rate"
FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
WHERE
  T2."season" = '2025' AND T1."over_number" BETWEEN 6 AND 14
GROUP BY
  "team_category";
question_english: Compare GT’s batting average and run rate in overs 7–15 with all other teams in IPL 2025.
question_hindi_1: IPL 2025 में, 7 से 15 ओवरों के बीच GT के बल्लेबाज़ी औसत और रन रेट की तुलना बाकी सभी टीमों से करें।
question_telugu_1: IPL 2025 లో 7 నుండి 15 ఓవర్ల మద్య GT బాటింగ్ ఆవెరేజ్ మరియు రన్ రేట్ మిగతా టీములుతో పోల్చండి.
question_punjabi: IPL 2025 ਵਿੱਚ 7-15 ਓਵਰਾਂ ਦੌਰਾਨ GT ਦੀ ਬੱਲੇਬਾਜ਼ੀ ਔਸਤ ਅਤੇ ਰਨ ਰੇਟ ਦੀ ਤੁਲਨਾ ਬਾਕੀ ਸਾਰੀਆਂ ਟੀਮਾਂ ਨਾਲ ਕਰੋ।

question: List all IPL bowlers with most first-over wickets since 2020.
query: SELECT T2."player_name", COUNT(T1."delivery_id") FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1."bowler_id" = T2."player_id" INNER JOIN Matches AS T3 ON T1."match_id" = T3."match_id" WHERE T3."season" >= '2020' AND T1."over_number" = 0 AND T1."player_out_id" IS NOT NULL AND T1."wicket_type" NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field') GROUP BY T2."player_name" ORDER BY COUNT(T1."delivery_id") DESC LIMIT 5
question_english: List all IPL bowlers with most first-over wickets since 2020.
question_hindi_1: 2020 से IPL में, पहले ओवर में सबसे ज़्यादा विकेट लेने वाले गेंदबाज़ों की सूची दें।
question_hindi_2: साल 2020 से IPL में पहले ओवर में सबसे ज़्यादा विकेट लेने वाले गेंदबाज़ कौन हैं?

question_punjabi: 2020 ਤੋਂ ਬਾਅਦ IPL ਵਿੱਚ ਪਹਿਲੇ ਓਵਰ ਵਿੱਚ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਵਿਕਟਾਂ ਲੈਣ ਵਾਲੇ ਸਾਰੇ ਗੇਂਦਬਾਜ਼ਾਂ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਦਿਓ।

question: Show the bowler with the most first-over wickets in IPL history.
query: SELECT T2."player_name", COUNT(T1."delivery_id") FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1."bowler_id" = T2."player_id" WHERE T1."over_number" = 0 AND T1."wicket_type" IS NOT NULL AND T1."wicket_type" NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field') GROUP BY T2."player_name" ORDER BY COUNT(T1."delivery_id") DESC LIMIT 1
question_english: Show the bowler with the most first-over wickets in IPL history.
question_hindi_1: IPL इतिहास में पहले ओवर में सबसे ज़्यादा विकेट लेने वाले गेंदबाज़ का नाम बताएं।
question_hindi_2: IPL इतिहास में पहले ओवर में सबसे ज़्यादा विकेट किस गेंदबाज़ ने लिए हैं?
question_telugu_1: IPL చరిత్రలో మొదటి ఓవర్లో అందరికన్నా ఎక్కువ వికెట్లు తీసుకున్న బౌలర్ ఎవరు?
question_punjabi: IPL ਇਤਿਹਾਸ ਵਿੱਚ ਪਹਿਲੇ ਓਵਰ ਵਿੱਚ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਵਿਕਟਾਂ ਲੈਣ ਵਾਲੇ ਗੇਂਦਬਾਜ਼ ਦਾ ਨਾਮ ਦਿਖਾਓ।

question: Show players with the most 25-plus scores in Men’s T20 competitions.
query:
WITH PlayerScores AS (
  SELECT
    "striker_id",
    SUM("runs_scored") AS "total_runs"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "striker_id"
)
SELECT
  p."player_name",
  COUNT(ps."striker_id") AS "num_25_plus_scores"
FROM PlayerScores AS ps
JOIN "Players" AS p
  ON ps."striker_id" = p."player_id"
WHERE
  ps."total_runs" >= 25
GROUP BY
  p."player_name"
ORDER BY
  "num_25_plus_scores" DESC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: Show players with the most 25-plus scores in Men’s T20 competitions.
question_hindi_1: *पुरुषों के T20 प्रतियोगिताओं में सबसे ज़्यादा 25+ स्कोर बनाने वाले खिलाड़ी दिखाएं।**
question_telugu_1: పురుషుల T20 పోటీలలో అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ 25+ స్కోర్లు తెచ్చుకున్న క్రీడాకార్లు ఎవరు?
question_punjabi: ਪੁਰਸ਼ਾਂ ਦੇ T20 ਮੁਕਾਬਲਿਆਂ ਵਿੱਚ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ 25 ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਸਕੋਰ ਬਣਾਉਣ ਵਾਲੇ ਖਿਡਾਰੀਆਂ ਦੇ ਨਾਮ ਦਿਖਾਓ।

question: List players with 300 or more sixes in IPL.
query: SELECT T2."player_name", COUNT(T1."delivery_id") FROM "Deliveries" AS T1 INNER JOIN "Players" AS T2 ON T1."striker_id" = T2."player_id" WHERE T1."runs_scored" = 6 GROUP BY T2."player_name" HAVING COUNT(T1."delivery_id") >= 300 ORDER BY COUNT(T1."delivery_id") DESC LIMIT 5
question_english: List players with 300 or more sixes in IPL.

question: Show MI’s highest opening partnerships in IPL playoffs.
query:
WITH MI_Playoff_Innings AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    T1.match_id,
    T2.inning
  FROM Matches AS T1
  INNER JOIN Deliveries AS T2
    ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id
  WHERE
    T1.stage <> 'Group' AND T2.batting_team = 'Mumbai Indians'
), First_Wicket_Deliveries AS (
  SELECT
    match_id,
    inning,
    MIN(delivery_id) AS first_wicket_delivery
  FROM Deliveries
  WHERE
    player_out_id IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY
    match_id,
    inning
), Opening_Partnerships AS (
  SELECT
    T1.match_id,
    T1.inning,
    SUM(T3.runs_scored + T3.extra_runs) AS partnership_runs
  FROM MI_Playoff_Innings AS T1
  LEFT JOIN First_Wicket_Deliveries AS T2
    ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id AND T1.inning = T2.inning
  INNER JOIN Deliveries AS T3
    ON T1.match_id = T3.match_id AND T1.inning = T3.inning
  WHERE
    T3.delivery_id < T2.first_wicket_delivery OR T2.first_wicket_delivery IS NULL
  GROUP BY
    T1.match_id,
    T1.inning
), Opening_Batsmen AS (
  SELECT
    match_id,
    inning,
    striker_id,
    non_striker_id
  FROM Deliveries
  WHERE
    over_number = 0 AND ball_number = 1
)
SELECT
  p1.player_name AS "Batsman 1",
  p2.player_name AS "Batsman 2",
  op.partnership_runs AS "Partnership Runs",
  CASE WHEN m.team1 = 'Mumbai Indians' THEN m.team2 ELSE m.team1 END AS "Opponent",
  m.match_date AS "Match Date"
FROM Opening_Partnerships AS op
INNER JOIN Opening_Batsmen AS ob
  ON op.match_id = ob.match_id AND op.inning = ob.inning
INNER JOIN Matches AS m
  ON op.match_id = m.match_id
INNER JOIN Players AS p1
  ON ob.striker_id = p1.player_id
INNER JOIN Players AS p2
  ON ob.non_striker_id = p2.player_id
ORDER BY
  "Partnership Runs" DESC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: Show MI’s highest opening partnerships in IPL playoffs.
question_hindi_1: IPL प्लेऑफ़ में MI की सबसे बड़ी ओपनिंग साझेदारियाँ दिखाओ।
question_telugu_1: IPL ప్లేఆఫ్స్‌్‌్‌ లో MI యొక్క అత్యాధికా పరుగుల సాధించిన ఓపెనింగ్ జంటలు ఏవరు?
question_punjabi: IPL ਪਲੇਅ-ਔਫ ਵਿੱਚ MI ਦੀਆਂ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਡੀਆਂ ਓਪਨਿੰਗ ਸਾਂਝੇਦਾਰੀਆਂ ਦਿਖਾਓ।

question: List matches where MI scored 80 or more runs for the first wicket in IPL playoffs.
query:
WITH MI_Playoff_Deliveries AS (
  SELECT
    T1."match_id",
    T1."inning",
    T1."runs_scored",
    T1."extra_runs",
    SUM(CASE WHEN T1."player_out_id" IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY T1."match_id", T1."inning" ORDER BY T1."over_number", T1."ball_number") AS wicket_group
  FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
  INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
  WHERE
    T2."stage" != 'Group' AND T1."batting_team" = 'Mumbai Indians'
), First_Wicket_Partnerships AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS first_wicket_runs
  FROM MI_Playoff_Deliveries
  WHERE
    wicket_group = 0
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "inning"
)
SELECT
  T1."match_date",
  T1."venue",
  CASE
    WHEN T1."team1" = 'Mumbai Indians' THEN T1."team2"
    ELSE T1."team1"
  END AS opponent,
  T2.first_wicket_runs
FROM "Matches" AS T1
INNER JOIN First_Wicket_Partnerships AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
WHERE
  T2.first_wicket_runs >= 80
ORDER BY
  T2.first_wicket_runs DESC
LIMIT 5;
answer: ('2025-05-30', 'Maharaja Yadavindra Singh International Cricket Stadium, New Chandigarh', 'Gujarat Titans', 84)
question_english: List matches where MI scored 80 or more runs for the first wicket in IPL playoffs.
question_hindi_1: IPL playoffs के उन मैचों की सूची बनाएं जिनमें MI ने पहले विकेट के लिए 80 या उससे ज़्यादा रन बनाए।
question_telugu_1: IPL ప్లేఆఫ్స్‌ లో MI తొలి వికేట్కు 80 లేదా దాని కన్నా ఎక్కువ పరుగులు సాధించిన మ్యాచ్‌లుఏమిటి?
question_punjabi: IPL ਪਲੇਅ-ਔਫ ਵਿੱਚ ਉਹਨਾਂ ਮੈਚਾਂ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਦਿਓ ਜਿੱਥੇ MI ਨੇ ਪਹਿਲੀ ਵਿਕਟ ਲਈ 80 ਜਾਂ ਇਸ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਰਨ ਬਣਾਏ ।

question: Show Rohit Sharma’s sixes tally compared to Chris Gayle in IPL.
query: SELECT T2."player_name", COUNT(T1."runs_scored") FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1."striker_id" = T2."player_id" WHERE T1."runs_scored" = 6 AND T2."player_name" IN ('RG Sharma', 'CH Gayle') GROUP BY T2."player_name" ORDER BY COUNT(T1."runs_scored") DESC;

question: List instances since 2022 when MI won the toss and chose to bat first.
query: SELECT "season", "match_date", "venue", CASE WHEN "team1" = 'Mumbai Indians' THEN "team2" ELSE "team1" END AS "opponent" FROM "Matches" WHERE "toss_winner" = 'Mumbai Indians' AND "toss_decision" = 'bat' AND "season" >= '2022' ORDER BY "match_date" DESC LIMIT 5

question_telugu_1: 2022 నుంచి MI టాస్ గెలిచి మొదటి బాటింగ్ ఇంచుకున్న సందర్భాలు ఏమిటి?

question: Show MI’s win–loss record in matches where they chose to bat first after winning the toss since 2022.
query:
SELECT
  SUM(CASE WHEN "match_winner" = 'Mumbai Indians' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Wins",
  SUM(CASE WHEN "match_winner" != 'Mumbai Indians' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Losses"
FROM "Matches"
WHERE
  "toss_winner" = 'Mumbai Indians' AND "toss_decision" = 'bat' AND SUBSTR("season", 1, 4) >= '2022';
question_english: Show MI’s win–loss record in matches where they chose to bat first after winning the toss since 2022.
question_hindi_1: 2022 से, टॉस जीतकर पहले बल्लेबाज़ी चुनने वाले मैचों में MI का जीत-हार का रिकॉर्ड बताइए।
question_hindi_2: 2022 से उन मैचों में MI का जीत-हार का रिकॉर्ड क्या है, जिनमें उन्होंने टॉस जीतकर पहले बल्लेबाज़ी चुनी हो?
question_telugu_1: 2022 నుంచి టాస్ గెలిచి మొదటి బాటింగ్ ఇంచుకున్న మ్యాచూలులో MI యొక్క గెలుపు-ఓటమూల రికార్డు ఏమిటి?
question_punjabi: 2022 ਤੋਂ ਬਾਅਦ ਉਹਨਾਂ ਮੈਚਾਂ ਵਿੱਚ MI ਦਾ ਜਿੱਤ-ਹਾਰ ਦਾ ਰਿਕਾਰਡ ਦਿਖਾਓ ਜਿੱਥੇ ਉਹਨਾਂ ਨੇ ਟਾਸ ਜਿੱਤਣ ਤੋਂ ਬਾਅਦ ਪਹਿਲਾਂ ਬੱਲੇਬਾਜ਼ੀ ਕਰਨ ਦੀ ਚੋਣ ਕੀਤੀ ਸੀ।

question: Show the highest individual run tally by an MI batter in any IPL season.
query: SELECT T2."player_name", SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS "total_runs" FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1."striker_id" = T2."player_id" INNER JOIN PlayerInMatch AS T3 ON T1."match_id" = T3."match_id" AND T1."striker_id" = T3."player_id" WHERE T3."team_name" = 'Mumbai Indians' GROUP BY T1."match_id", T2."player_name" ORDER BY "total_runs" DESC LIMIT 1
question_english: Show the highest individual run tally by an MI batter in any IPL season.
question_hindi_1: किसी भी IPL सीज़न में MI के किसी बल्लेबाज़ का सर्वोच्च व्यक्तिगत स्कोर बताइए।
question_telugu_1: ఏదైనా IPL సీజన్ లో ఒక MI బ్యాటర్ యొక్క అత్యధిక వ్యక్తిగత స్కోర్ తెలపండి.
question_punjabi: ਕਿਸੇ ਵੀ IPL ਸੀਜ਼ਨ ਵਿੱਚ MI ਦੇ ਬੱਲੇਬਾਜ਼ ਦੁਆਰਾ ਬਣਾਏ ਗਏ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਵਿਅਕਤੀਗਤ ਰਨ ਦਿਖਾਓ।

question: Show teams that used the same top three batters in all league matches of an IPL season.
query:
WITH BattingOrder AS (
  SELECT
    T1."match_id",
    T1."batting_team",
    T1."striker_id",
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY T1."match_id", T1."batting_team" ORDER BY T1.first_ball_faced) AS batting_position
  FROM (
    SELECT
      "match_id",
      "batting_team",
      "striker_id",
      MIN("delivery_id") AS first_ball_faced
    FROM "Deliveries"
    GROUP BY
      "match_id",
      "batting_team",
      "striker_id"
  ) AS T1
), MatchTop3Lineup AS (
  SELECT
    M."season",
    B."batting_team",
    GROUP_CONCAT(B."striker_id" ORDER BY B.batting_position) AS top_3_batters
  FROM BattingOrder AS B
  JOIN "Matches" AS M
    ON B.match_id = M.match_id
  WHERE
    B.batting_position <= 3 AND M."stage" = 'Group'
  GROUP BY
    M."season",
    B.match_id,
    B."batting_team"
  HAVING
    COUNT(B."striker_id") = 3
)
SELECT
  "season",
  "batting_team"
FROM MatchTop3Lineup
GROUP BY
  "season",
  "batting_team"
HAVING
  COUNT(DISTINCT top_3_batters) = 1 AND COUNT(*) > 1
ORDER BY
  "season" DESC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: Show teams that used the same top three batters in all league matches of an IPL season.
question_hindi_1: ऐसी टीमें दिखाएँ जिन्होंने किसी IPL सीज़न के सभी लीग मैचों में एक ही टॉप तीन बल्लेबाज़ों को खिलाया हो।

question_hindi_3: वे कौन सी टीमें हैं जिन्होंने IPL के किसी सीज़न में अपने सभी लीग मैचों में सेम टॉप तीन बल्लेबाज़ों के साथ खेला?

question: Compare GT’s batting average and strike rate in IPL 2025 with MI’s bowling average, strike rate, and economy rate.
query: WITH GT_Batting AS (SELECT CAST(SUM("runs_scored") AS REAL) AS gt_total_runs, COUNT("player_out_id") AS gt_dismissals, COUNT("delivery_id") AS gt_balls_faced FROM "Deliveries" INNER JOIN "Matches" ON "Deliveries"."match_id" = "Matches"."match_id" WHERE "Matches"."season" = '2025' AND "Deliveries"."batting_team" = 'Gujarat Titans'), MI_Bowling AS (SELECT CAST(SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS REAL) AS mi_runs_conceded, COUNT(CASE WHEN "wicket_type" NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field') AND "player_out_id" IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) AS mi_wickets_taken, COUNT("delivery_id") AS mi_balls_bowled FROM "Deliveries" INNER JOIN "Matches" ON "Deliveries"."match_id" = "Matches"."match_id" WHERE "Matches"."season" = '2025' AND "Deliveries"."bowling_team" = 'Mumbai Indians') SELECT gt_total_runs / gt_dismissals AS "GT Batting Average", gt_total_runs * 100 / gt_balls_faced AS "GT Batting Strike Rate", mi_runs_conceded / mi_wickets_taken AS "MI Bowling Average", CAST(mi_balls_bowled AS REAL) / mi_wickets_taken AS "MI Bowling Strike Rate", mi_runs_conceded * 6 / mi_balls_bowled AS "MI Bowling Economy" FROM GT_Batting, MI_Bowling
question_english: Compare GT’s batting average and strike rate in IPL 2025 with MI’s bowling average, strike rate, and economy rate.
question_hindi_1: IPL 2025 में GT के बल्लेबाज़ी औसत और स्ट्राइक रेट की तुलना MI के गेंदबाज़ी औसत, स्ट्राइक रेट, और इकोनॉमी रेट से करें।
question_telugu_1: IPL 2025 లో GT యొక్క బ్యాటింగ్ ఆవెరేజ్ మరియు స్ట్రైక్ రేట్ ని MI యొక్క బౌలింగ్ ఆవెరేజ్, స్ట్రైక్ రేట్ మరియు ఎకానమీ రేట్ తో పోల్చండి.

question: Show all the bowlers who have bowled maiden overs bowled in powerplay overs in IPL 2025.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T3."player_name" FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Matches AS T2 ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" INNER JOIN Players AS T3 ON T1."bowler_id" = T3."player_id" WHERE T2."season" = '2025' AND T1."over_number" <= 5 GROUP BY T1."match_id", T1."inning", T1."over_number", T1."bowler_id" HAVING SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") = 0;
question_english: Show all the bowlers who have bowled maiden overs bowled in powerplay overs in IPL 2025.

question: Show the lowest target successfully defended in IPL playoffs.
query: SELECT MIN(T1.total_runs) + 1 FROM (SELECT SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS total_runs FROM Deliveries WHERE "inning" = 1 AND "match_id" IN (SELECT "match_id" FROM Matches WHERE "stage" != 'Group') GROUP BY "match_id", "batting_team" HAVING "batting_team" = (SELECT "match_winner" FROM Matches WHERE "match_id" = Deliveries.match_id)) AS T1
question_english: Show the lowest target successfully defended in IPL playoffs.

question: list the 5 lowest team totals in ipl playoffs.List the scores, the team and the year.
query: SELECT SUM(T2."runs_scored" + T2."extra_runs") AS total, CASE T2."batting_team" WHEN 'Deccan Chargers' THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad' WHEN 'Delhi Daredevils' THEN 'Delhi Capitals' WHEN 'Kings XI Punjab' THEN 'Punjab Kings' WHEN 'Pune Warriors' THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant' WHEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant' THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant' WHEN 'Rising Pune Supergiants' THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant' WHEN 'Royal Challengers Bangalore' THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru' ELSE T2."batting_team" END, T1."season" FROM Matches AS T1 INNER JOIN Deliveries AS T2 ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" WHERE T1."stage" <> 'Group' GROUP BY T1."match_id", T2."batting_team" ORDER BY total ASC LIMIT 5
question_english: list the 5 lowest team totals in ipl playoffs.List the scores, the team and the year.

question: What is punjab's lowest score at the fall of 5th wicket in ipl 2025?
query:
WITH PunjabDeliveries AS (
  SELECT
    T1."match_id",
    T1."inning",
    T1."over_number",
    T1."ball_number",
    T1."runs_scored",
    T1."extra_runs",
    T1."player_out_id"
  FROM Deliveries AS T1
  INNER JOIN Matches AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
  WHERE
    T2."season" = '2025' AND T1."batting_team" IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings')
), RunningTotals AS (
  SELECT
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS "running_score",
    COUNT("player_out_id") OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS "wickets_fallen"
  FROM PunjabDeliveries
)
SELECT
  MIN("running_score")
FROM RunningTotals
WHERE
  "wickets_fallen" = 5;
question_english: What is punjab's lowest score at the fall of 5th wicket in ipl 2025?
question_hindi_1: IPL 2025 में 5 विकेट गिरने पर पंजाब का सबसे कम स्कोर क्या है?
question_telugu_1: IPL 2025 లో 5 వికెట్లు పడేడప్పుడు పంజాబ్ యొక్క అన్నిటికన్నా తక్కువ స్కోర్ ఏమిటి?
question_punjabi: IPL 2025 ਵਿੱਚ 5ਵੀਂ ਵਿਕਟ ਡਿੱਗਣ ਵੇਲੇ ਪੰਜਾਬ ਦਾ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਘੱਟ ਸਕੋਰ ਕੀ ਸੀ?

question: List the top 5 bowlers with the best economy rate in overs 1–6 in IPL 2025 among those who bowled 15 or more overs.
query: SELECT T2."player_name", CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") AS REAL) * 6.0 / COUNT(T1."delivery_id") AS economy FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Matches AS T3 ON T1."match_id" = T3."match_id" INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1."bowler_id" = T2."player_id" WHERE T3."season" = '2025' AND T1."over_number" <= 5 GROUP BY T1."bowler_id" HAVING COUNT(T1."delivery_id") >= 90 ORDER BY economy ASC LIMIT 5
question_english: List the top 5 bowlers with the best economy rate in overs 1–6 in IPL 2025 among those who bowled 15 or more overs.
question_hindi_1: IPL 2025 में, 1 से 6 ओवरों के बीच सबसे अच्छी इकोनॉमी रेट वाले उन टॉप 5 गेंदबाज़ों की सूची बनाएं, जिन्होंने 15 या उससे ज़्यादा ओवर फेंके हों।
question_hindi_2: IPL 2025 के उन टॉप 5 गेंदबाज़ों के नाम बताएं जिनका पावरप्ले (ओवर 1-6) में इकोनॉमी रेट सबसे बेहतरीन रहा हो, और जिन्होंने कम से कम 15 ओवर डाले हों।
question_hindi_3: IPL 2025 में न्यूनतम 15 ओवर फेंकने वाले गेंदबाज़ों में से, ओवर 1-6 में सर्वश्रेष्ठ इकोनॉमी रेट वाले टॉप 5 गेंदबाज़ों की सूची दें।
question_telugu_1: IPL 2025 లో 1 నుంచి 6 ఓవర్లలో అన్నిటికన్నా మంచి ఎకానమీ రేట్ కలిగి, 15 లేదా అంతకన్నా ఎక్కువ ఓవర్లు బౌలింగ్ చేసిన టాప్ 5 బౌలర్ల పేరులు రాయండి.
question_telugu_2: IPL 2025 లో కనీసం 15 ఓవర్లు బౌలింగ్ చేసిన బౌలర్లలో, 1 నుంచి 6 ఓవర్లలో అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ ఎకానమీ రేట్ ఉన్న టాప్ 5 బౌలర్ల పేరులు రాయండి.
question_punjabi: IPL 2025 ਵਿੱਚ 1 ਤੋਂ 6 ਓਵਰਾਂ ਦਰਮਿਆਨ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵਧੀਆ ਇਕਾਨਮੀ ਰੇਟ ਵਾਲੇ ਚੋਟੀ ਦੇ 5 ਗੇਂਦਬਾਜ਼ਾਂ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਦਿਓ (ਉਹਨਾਂ ਵਿੱਚੋਂ ਜਿਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਨੇ 15 ਜਾਂ ਇਸ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਓਵਰ ਕੀਤੇ ਹਨ)।

question: Show the team with the lowest economy rate and highest dot-ball percentage in IPL 2025 with the corresponding numbers.
query: WITH TeamStats AS (SELECT T1."bowling_team", CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") AS REAL) * 6 / COUNT(T1."delivery_id") AS economy, CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1."runs_scored" = 0 AND T1."extra_runs" = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1."delivery_id") AS dot_percentage FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Matches AS T2 ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" WHERE T2."season" = '2025' GROUP BY T1."bowling_team"), RankedStats AS (SELECT "bowling_team", "economy", "dot_percentage", RANK() OVER (ORDER BY "economy" ASC) AS economy_rank, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY "dot_percentage" DESC) AS dot_rank FROM TeamStats) SELECT "bowling_team", "economy", "dot_percentage" FROM RankedStats ORDER BY (economy_rank + dot_rank) ASC LIMIT 1
question_english: Show the team with the lowest economy rate and highest dot-ball percentage in IPL 2025 with the corresponding numbers.
question_hindi_1: IPL 2025 में सबसे कम इकोनॉमी रेट और सबसे ज़्यादा डॉट बॉल प्रतिशत वाली टीम का नाम, उसके संबंधित आंकड़ों के साथ बताइए।
question_telugu_1: IPL 2025 లో అన్నిటికన్నా తక్కువ ఎకానమీ రేట్ మరియు అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ డాట్ బాల్ శాతం ఉన్న టీం పేరు మరియు తాని సంబందించిన గణాంకాలు ఏమిటి?
question_punjabi: IPL 2025 ਵਿੱਚ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਘੱਟ ਇਕਾਨਮੀ ਰੇਟ ਅਤੇ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਡਾਟ-ਬਾਲ ਪ੍ਰਤੀਸ਼ਤ ਵਾਲੀ ਟੀਮ ਅਤੇ ਉਹਨਾਂ ਦੇ ਅੰਕੜੇ ਦਿਖਾਓ।

question: List the punjab batters who have scored 500+ runs in a single ipl season alongwith the runs
query: SELECT T3."player_name", T2."season", SUM(T1."runs_scored") FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Matches AS T2 ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" INNER JOIN Players AS T3 ON T1."striker_id" = T3."player_id" WHERE T1."batting_team" IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings') GROUP BY T2."season", T3."player_name" HAVING SUM(T1."runs_scored") >= 500 ORDER BY SUM(T1."runs_scored") DESC;
question_english: List the punjab batters who have scored 500+ runs in a single ipl season alongwith the runs
question_hindi_1: पंजाब के उन बल्लेबाज़ों के नाम बताएं जिन्होंने किसी एक IPL सीज़न में 500 से ज़्यादा रन बनाए हैं, साथ में उनके रन भी बताएं।

question: Show Virat Kohli’s overall batting record against PBKS in IPL — matches, runs, average, strike rate, centuries, and fifties.
query:
WITH KohliMatchRuns AS (
  SELECT
    T1."match_id",
    SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS runs,
    COUNT(T1."delivery_id") AS balls
  FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
  WHERE
    T1."striker_id" = (
      SELECT
        "player_id"
      FROM "Players"
      WHERE
        "player_name" = 'V Kohli'
    ) AND T1."bowling_team" IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings')
  GROUP BY
    T1."match_id"
), KohliDismissals AS (
  SELECT
    COUNT(T1."delivery_id") AS dismissals
  FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
  WHERE
    T1."player_out_id" = (
      SELECT
        "player_id"
      FROM "Players"
      WHERE
        "player_name" = 'V Kohli'
    ) AND T1."bowling_team" IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings')
)
SELECT
  COUNT(T1."match_id") AS "Matches",
  SUM(T1.runs) AS "Runs",
  CAST(SUM(T1.runs) AS REAL) / T2.dismissals AS "Average",
  CAST(SUM(T1.runs) AS REAL) * 100 / SUM(T1.balls) AS "Strike Rate",
  SUM(CASE WHEN T1.runs >= 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Centuries",
  SUM(CASE WHEN T1.runs >= 50 AND T1.runs < 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Fifties"
FROM KohliMatchRuns AS T1, KohliDismissals AS T2;
question_english: Show Virat Kohli’s overall batting record against PBKS in IPL — matches, runs, average, strike rate, centuries, and fifties.
question_hindi_1: IPL में PBKS के खिलाफ़ विराट कोहली का कुल बल्लेबाज़ी रिकॉर्ड बताइए — मैच, रन, औसत, स्ट्राइक रेट, शतक और अर्धशतक।
question_telugu_1: IPL లో PBKS కి వెతిరేకంగా Virat Kohli యొక్క మొత్తం మీద బ్యాటింగ్ రికార్డు ఏమిటి - మ్యాచూలు, పరుగులు, ఆవెరేజ్, స్ట్రైక్ రేట్, శతకాలు మరియు అర్ధశతకాలు.
question_punjabi: IPL ਵਿੱਚ PBKS ਦੇ ਖਿਲਾਫ Virat Kohli ਦਾ ਸਮੁੱਚਾ ਬੱਲੇਬਾਜ਼ੀ ਰਿਕਾਰਡ ਦਿਖਾਓ — ਮੈਚ, ਰਨ, ਔਸਤ, ਸਟ੍ਰਾਈਕ ਰੇਟ, ਸੈਂਕੜੇ ਅਤੇ ਅਰਧ-ਸੈਂਕੜੇ।

question: Show Kohli’s batting stats while chasing in IPL 2025 — runs, innings, average, and strike rate.
query:
SELECT
  SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS "Runs",
  COUNT(DISTINCT T1."match_id") AS "Innings",
  CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS REAL) / SUM(CASE WHEN T1."player_out_id" = T1."striker_id" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Average",
  CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1."delivery_id") AS "Strike_Rate"
FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T3
  ON T1."striker_id" = T3."player_id"
WHERE
  T3."player_name" LIKE 'V Kohli%' AND T2."season" = '2025' AND T1."inning" = 2 AND NOT (
    T1."extra_runs" > 0 AND T1."runs_scored" = 0 AND T1."wicket_type" IS NULL
  );
question_english: Show Kohli’s batting stats while chasing in IPL 2025 — runs, innings, average, and strike rate.
question_hindi_1: IPL 2025 में लक्ष्य का पीछा करते हुए Virat Kohli के रन, पारी, औसत, और स्ट्राइक रेट दिखाओ।
question_telugu_1: IPL 2025 లో వెంబడిస్తున్నప్పుడు Kohli యొక్క పరుగులు, ఇన్నిన్గులు, ఆవెరేజ్, మరియు స్ట్రైక్ రేట్ రాయండి.

question: Show Iyer’s strike rate in IPL 2025 during powerplay, middle overs, and death overs
query: SELECT T2."player_name", CASE WHEN T1."over_number" <= 5 THEN 'Powerplay' WHEN T1."over_number" > 5 AND T1."over_number" <= 14 THEN 'Middle Overs' ELSE 'Death Overs' END AS match_phase, CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS REAL) * 100.0 / COUNT(T1."delivery_id") AS strike_rate FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1."striker_id" = T2."player_id" INNER JOIN Matches AS T3 ON T1."match_id" = T3."match_id" WHERE T2."player_name" LIKE '%Iyer%' AND T3."season" = '2025' AND NOT (T1."extra_runs" > 0 AND T1."runs_scored" = 0 AND T1."wicket_type" IS NULL) GROUP BY T2."player_name", match_phase ORDER BY T2."player_name", CASE WHEN match_phase = 'Powerplay' THEN 1 WHEN match_phase = 'Middle Overs' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END
question_english: Show Iyer’s strike rate in IPL 2025 during powerplay, middle overs, and death overs
question_hindi_1: IPL 2025 में पॉवरप्ले, मिडिल ओवर्स, और डेथ ओवर्स में अय्यर का स्ट्राइक रेट बताइए।
question_telugu_1: IPL 2025 లో పవర్ప్లే, మిడిల్ ఓవర్స్ మరియు డెత్ ఓవర్స్ లో Iyer యొక్క స్ట్రైక్ రేట్ రాయండి.

question: List the top 5 highest scores from No.6 or lower in successful IPL run-chases
query:
WITH BattingOrder AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "striker_id",
    DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning" ORDER BY MIN("delivery_id")) AS batting_position
  FROM "Deliveries"
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "striker_id"
), PlayerScores AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "striker_id",
    "batting_team",
    SUM("runs_scored") AS total_runs
  FROM "Deliveries"
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "striker_id",
    "batting_team"
)
SELECT
  T3."player_name",
  T2.total_runs,
  T4."venue",
  T4."match_date"
FROM BattingOrder AS T1
INNER JOIN PlayerScores AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
  AND T1."striker_id" = T2."striker_id"
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T3
  ON T1."striker_id" = T3."player_id"
INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T4
  ON T1."match_id" = T4."match_id"
WHERE
  T1.inning = 2 AND T1.batting_position >= 6 AND T2.batting_team = T4.match_winner
ORDER BY
  T2.total_runs DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: what is the highest partnership for RCB for 5th wicket or lower in a run-chase.Give the batsman involved with the partnership.
query:
WITH WicketEvents AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "over_number",
    "ball_number",
    "striker_id",
    "non_striker_id",
    "runs_scored" + "extra_runs" AS "total_runs",
    CASE WHEN "player_out_id" IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "is_wicket"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "inning" = 2 AND "batting_team" IN ('Royal Challengers Bangalore', 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru')
), PartnershipGroups AS (
  SELECT
    T1."match_id",
    T1."striker_id",
    T1."non_striker_id",
    T1."total_runs",
    COALESCE(SUM(T1."is_wicket") OVER (PARTITION BY T1."match_id" ORDER BY T1."over_number", T1."ball_number" ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING), 0) AS "wickets_down"
  FROM WicketEvents AS T1
  JOIN "Matches" AS M
    ON T1."match_id" = M."match_id"
  WHERE
    M."result_type" != 'no result'
), PartnershipStats AS (
  SELECT
    SUM("total_runs") AS "partnership_runs",
    MIN(CASE WHEN "striker_id" < "non_striker_id" THEN "striker_id" ELSE "non_striker_id" END) AS "batsman1_id",
    MAX(CASE WHEN "striker_id" > "non_striker_id" THEN "striker_id" ELSE "non_striker_id" END) AS "batsman2_id"
  FROM PartnershipGroups
  WHERE
    "wickets_down" >= 4
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "wickets_down"
)
SELECT
  PS."partnership_runs",
  P1."player_name",
  P2."player_name"
FROM PartnershipStats AS PS
JOIN "Players" AS P1
  ON PS."batsman1_id" = P1."player_id"
JOIN "Players" AS P2
  ON PS."batsman2_id" = P2."player_id"
ORDER BY
  PS."partnership_runs" DESC
LIMIT 1;
question_english: what is the highest partnership for RCB for 5th wicket or lower in a run-chase.Give the batsman involved with the partnership.
question_hindi_1: रन-चेज़ में RCB के लिए पाँचवें विकेट या उसके बाद के लिए सबसे बड़ी साझेदारी कौन सी है? इस साझेदारी में शामिल बल्लेबाज़ों के नाम भी बताइए।

question: List the 5 most expensive bowling spells with figures, bowler and the teams and year.
query: SELECT T2."player_name", T3."season", T1."bowling_team", T1."batting_team", SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") AS "runs_conceded", SUM(CASE WHEN T1."wicket_type" IS NOT NULL AND T1."wicket_type" NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field', 'retired out') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "wickets_taken" FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1."bowler_id" = T2."player_id" INNER JOIN Matches AS T3 ON T1."match_id" = T3."match_id" WHERE T3."result_type" != 'no result' GROUP BY T1."match_id", T1."bowler_id" ORDER BY "runs_conceded" DESC LIMIT 5
question_english: List the 5 most expensive bowling spells with figures, bowler and the teams and year.

question: Find the top 5 players with the highest strike rates who scored atleast 400 runs in an ipl season.
query:
SELECT
  T3."player_name",
  T2."season",
  SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS "total_runs",
  CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(
    CASE
      WHEN T1."extra_runs" = 0
      OR T1."runs_scored" > 0
      OR T1."wicket_type" IS NOT NULL THEN 1
    END
  ) AS "strike_rate"
FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T3
  ON T1."striker_id" = T3."player_id"
GROUP BY
  T3."player_name",
  T2."season"
HAVING
  SUM(T1."runs_scored") >= 400
ORDER BY
  "strike_rate" DESC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: Find the top 5 players with the highest strike rates who scored atleast 400 runs in an ipl season.

question: List the teams that failed to have a 50 run opening stand in a season.List the teams,year and their highest opening stand for that season
query:
WITH OpeningPartnershipRuns AS (
  SELECT
    T1."match_id",
    T1."inning",
    T1."batting_team",
    SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") AS opening_runs
  FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
      "match_id",
      "inning",
      MIN("delivery_id") AS first_wicket_delivery_id
    FROM "Deliveries"
    WHERE
      "wicket_type" IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY
      "match_id",
      "inning"
  ) AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
    AND T1."inning" = T2."inning"
  WHERE
    T1."delivery_id" < T2.first_wicket_delivery_id OR T2.first_wicket_delivery_id IS NULL
  GROUP BY
    T1."match_id",
    T1."inning",
    T1."batting_team"
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN T1."batting_team" = 'Delhi Daredevils'
    THEN 'Delhi Capitals'
    WHEN T1."batting_team" = 'Kings XI Punjab'
    THEN 'Punjab Kings'
    WHEN T1."batting_team" = 'Deccan Chargers'
    THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'
    WHEN T1."batting_team" IN ('Pune Warriors', 'Rising Pune Supergiants')
    THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant'
    WHEN T1."batting_team" = 'Royal Challengers Bangalore'
    THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
    ELSE T1."batting_team"
  END AS "team",
  T2."season" AS "year",
  MAX(T1."opening_runs") AS "highest_opening_stand"
FROM OpeningPartnershipRuns AS T1
JOIN "Matches" AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
GROUP BY
  "team",
  "year"
HAVING
  MAX(T1."opening_runs") < 50
ORDER BY
  "team",
  "year";
question_english: List the teams that failed to have a 50 run opening stand in a season.List the teams,year and their highest opening stand for that season
question_hindi_1: उन टीमों की सूची बनाएँ जो किसी सीज़न में 50 रन की ओपनिंग साझेदारी नहीं कर पाईं। टीमों का नाम, साल और उस सीज़न में उनकी सबसे बड़ी ओपनिंग साझेदारी भी बताएँ।

question: What was the lowest powerplay score in ahmedabad in ipl 2025?
query: SELECT SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Matches AS T2 ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" WHERE T2."city" = 'Ahmedabad' AND T2."season" = '2025' AND T1."over_number" < 6 GROUP BY T1."match_id", T1."inning" ORDER BY SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") ASC LIMIT 1
question_english: What was the lowest powerplay score in ahmedabad in ipl 2025?

question: Which bowler conceded the most sixes in an ipl season. List the top 5 bowlers with the number of sixes conceded by them.
query: SELECT T3."player_name", T2."season", COUNT(T1."delivery_id") FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Matches AS T2 ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" INNER JOIN Players AS T3 ON T1."bowler_id" = T3."player_id" WHERE T1."runs_scored" = 6 GROUP BY T3."player_name", T2."season" ORDER BY COUNT(T1."delivery_id") DESC LIMIT 5

question: List all instances of 200+ targets getting chased down in jaipur.
query:
SELECT
  T1."season",
  T1."venue",
  T2.inning1_score + 1 AS target,
  T1."match_winner" AS chasing_team
FROM Matches AS T1
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS inning1_score
  FROM Deliveries
  WHERE
    "inning" = 1
  GROUP BY
    "match_id"
) AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS inning2_score
  FROM Deliveries
  WHERE
    "inning" = 2
  GROUP BY
    "match_id"
) AS T3
  ON T1."match_id" = T3."match_id"
WHERE
  T1."city" = 'Jaipur' AND T2.inning1_score >= 199 AND T3.inning2_score > T2.inning1_score;
question_english: List all instances of 200+ targets getting chased down in jaipur.

question: List the top 5 run scorers in last 5 overs since the start of 2024.
query: SELECT T2.player_name, SUM(T1.runs_scored) FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1.striker_id = T2.player_id INNER JOIN Matches AS T3 ON T1.match_id = T3.match_id WHERE T3.match_date >= '2024-01-01' AND T1.over_number >= 15 GROUP BY T2.player_name ORDER BY SUM(T1.runs_scored) DESC LIMIT 5

question: Highest SR in lst 5 overs Overs in IPL 2025 (min 25 balls). list the top 5 with their runs, balls played and strike rate.
query: SELECT T2.player_name, SUM(T1.runs_scored) AS total_runs, COUNT(CASE WHEN NOT (T1.extra_runs > 0 AND T1.runs_scored = 0 AND T1.wicket_type IS NULL) THEN 1 END) AS balls_faced, (SUM(T1.runs_scored) * 100.0) / COUNT(CASE WHEN NOT (T1.extra_runs > 0 AND T1.runs_scored = 0 AND T1.wicket_type IS NULL) THEN 1 END) AS strike_rate FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1.striker_id = T2.player_id INNER JOIN Matches AS T3 ON T1.match_id = T3.match_id WHERE T3.season = '2025' AND T1.over_number >= 15 GROUP BY T2.player_name HAVING COUNT(CASE WHEN NOT (T1.extra_runs > 0 AND T1.runs_scored = 0 AND T1.wicket_type IS NULL) THEN 1 END) >= 25 ORDER BY strike_rate DESC LIMIT 5
question_english: Highest SR in lst 5 overs Overs in IPL 2025 (min 25 balls). list the top 5 with their runs, balls played and strike rate.

question: List the top 5 players who have missed the most matches between 2 appearances for a franchise.
query:
WITH PlayerMatchDates AS (
  SELECT
    T1."player_id",
    T1."team_name",
    T2."match_date"
  FROM "PlayerInMatch" AS T1
  INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
), PlayerConsecutiveAppearances AS (
  SELECT
    "player_id",
    "team_name",
    "match_date",
    LEAD("match_date", 1) OVER (PARTITION BY "player_id", "team_name" ORDER BY "match_date") AS "next_match_date"
  FROM PlayerMatchDates
)
SELECT
  T3."player_name",
  T1."team_name",
  (
    SELECT
      COUNT(T2."match_id")
    FROM "Matches" AS T2
    WHERE
      (
        T2."team1" = T1."team_name" OR T2."team2" = T1."team_name"
      )
      AND T2."match_date" > T1."match_date"
      AND T2."match_date" < T1."next_match_date"
  ) AS "missed_matches"
FROM PlayerConsecutiveAppearances AS T1
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T3
  ON T1."player_id" = T3."player_id"
WHERE
  T1."next_match_date" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
  "missed_matches" DESC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: List the top 5 players who have missed the most matches between 2 appearances for a franchise.
question_hindi_1: *ऐसे टॉप 5 खिलाड़ियों के नाम बताइए, जिन्होंने एक ही फ्रैंचाइज़ी के लिए दो बार खेलने के बीच सबसे ज़्यादा मैच मिस किए हैं।**

question_telugu_1: ఏ టాప్ 5 క్రీడాకార్లు ఒక ఫ్రాంఛైజీ కోసం 2 ఆటల మాజ్జిలో అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ ఆటలు ఆడలేదు?

question: List the top 5 players, between 2 appearances of whom a franchise played the most number of matches.
query:
WITH FranchiseMatches AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    CASE
      WHEN "team_name" IN ('Delhi Daredevils', 'Delhi Capitals') THEN 'Delhi Capitals'
      WHEN "team_name" IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings') THEN 'Punjab Kings'
      WHEN "team_name" IN ('Deccan Chargers', 'Sunrisers Hyderabad') THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'
      WHEN "team_name" IN ('Pune Warriors', 'Rising Pune Supergiant', 'Rising Pune Supergiants') THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant'
      WHEN "team_name" IN ('Royal Challengers Bangalore', 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru') THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
      ELSE "team_name"
    END AS "franchise_name"
  FROM
    (
      SELECT
        "match_id",
        "team1" AS "team_name"
      FROM "Matches"
      UNION ALL
      SELECT
        "match_id",
        "team2" AS "team_name"
      FROM "Matches"
    )
), FranchiseMatchNumbers AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "franchise_name",
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY "franchise_name" ORDER BY "match_id") AS "franchise_match_seq"
  FROM FranchiseMatches
), PlayerAppearanceSequence AS (
  SELECT
    T1."player_id",
    T2."franchise_name",
    T2."franchise_match_seq"
  FROM "PlayerInMatch" AS T1
  JOIN FranchiseMatchNumbers AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
  WHERE
    T2."franchise_name" = CASE
      WHEN T1."team_name" IN ('Delhi Daredevils', 'Delhi Capitals') THEN 'Delhi Capitals'
      WHEN T1."team_name" IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings') THEN 'Punjab Kings'
      WHEN T1."team_name" IN ('Deccan Chargers', 'Sunrisers Hyderabad') THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'
      WHEN T1."team_name" IN ('Pune Warriors', 'Rising Pune Supergiant', 'Rising Pune Supergiants') THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant'
      WHEN T1."team_name" IN ('Royal Challengers Bangalore', 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru') THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
      ELSE T1."team_name"
    END
), AppearanceGaps AS (
  SELECT
    "player_id",
    "franchise_name",
    "franchise_match_seq" - LAG("franchise_match_seq", 1) OVER (PARTITION BY "player_id", "franchise_name" ORDER BY "franchise_match_seq") AS "gap"
  FROM PlayerAppearanceSequence
)
SELECT
  T3."player_name",
  T4."franchise_name",
  T4."gap" - 1 AS "matches_missed"
FROM AppearanceGaps AS T4
JOIN "Players" AS T3
  ON T4."player_id" = T3."player_id"
WHERE
  T4."gap" > 1
ORDER BY
  "matches_missed" DESC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: List the top 5 players, between 2 appearances of whom a franchise played the most number of matches.
question_hindi_1: उन टॉप 5 खिलाड़ियों के नाम बताइए, जिनके किन्हीं दो मैचों में खेलने के बीच उनकी फ्रेंचाइज़ी ने सबसे ज़्यादा मैच खेले।
question_hindi_2: ऐसे 5 खिलाड़ियों की सूची बनाएँ, जिनके दो मैचों में खेलने के बीच उनकी टीम ने सबसे ज़्यादा मैच खेले हों।

question: List the 4 highest powerplay scores in lucknow in ipl
query: SELECT T1.venue, T2.batting_team, SUM(T2.runs_scored) + SUM(T2.extra_runs) AS "total_runs" FROM Matches AS T1 INNER JOIN Deliveries AS T2 ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id WHERE T1.city = 'Lucknow' AND T2.over_number <= 5 GROUP BY T1.match_id, T2.inning ORDER BY total_runs DESC LIMIT 4

question: List the 2 quickest team 50 in a match in lucknow.
query: WITH TeamScores AS (SELECT T1.match_id, T1.inning, T1.batting_team, SUM(T1.runs_scored + T1.extra_runs) OVER (PARTITION BY T1.match_id, T1.inning ORDER BY T1.over_number, T1.ball_number) AS cumulative_runs, (T1.over_number * 6 + T1.ball_number) AS balls FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Matches AS T2 ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id WHERE T2.city = 'Lucknow') SELECT batting_team, MIN(balls) AS balls_to_50 FROM TeamScores WHERE cumulative_runs >= 50 GROUP BY match_id, inning ORDER BY balls_to_50 ASC LIMIT 2
question_english: List the 2 quickest team 50 in a match in lucknow.
question_hindi_1: लखनऊ में किसी मैच में बने दो सबसे तेज़ टीम 50 बताइए।

question_punjabi: ਲਖਨਊ ਵਿੱਚ ਕਿਸੇ ਮੈਚ ਵਿੱਚ ਟੀਮ ਵੱਲੋਂ ਬਣਾਏ ਗਏ 2 ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਤੇਜ਼ 50 ਰਨ|

question: Most 200+ totals conceded by a team since 2022.
query: SELECT T1.bowling_team, COUNT(*) AS times_conceded_200_plus FROM (SELECT T2.bowling_team FROM Matches AS T1 INNER JOIN Deliveries AS T2 ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id WHERE T1.season >= '2022' GROUP BY T1.match_id, T2.inning, T2.bowling_team HAVING SUM(T2.runs_scored + T2.extra_runs) >= 200) AS T1 GROUP BY T1.bowling_team ORDER BY times_conceded_200_plus DESC;
question_english: Most 200+ totals conceded by a team since 2022.
question_hindi_1: 2022 से किस टीम ने सबसे ज़्यादा बार 200+ रन दिए हैं?
question_telugu_1: 2022 నుంచి ఏ టీం అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ సార్లు 200 కన్నా ఎక్కువ పరుగులు ఇచ్చారు?
question_punjabi: 2022 ਤੋਂ ਬਾਅਦ ਕਿਸੇ ਟੀਮ ਦੁਆਰਾ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਵਾਰ 200+ ਸਕੋਰ ਖਾਧੇ ਜਾਣ ਦਾ ਰਿਕਾਰਡ।

question: top 4 Highest partnership average in ipl with minimum 1000 runs.
query:
WITH PartnershipDeliveries AS (
  SELECT
    MIN("striker_id", "non_striker_id") AS p1_id,
    MAX("striker_id", "non_striker_id") AS p2_id,
    "runs_scored",
    "extra_runs",
    "player_out_id",
    "wicket_type"
  FROM "Deliveries"
), PartnershipStats AS (
  SELECT
    p1_id,
    p2_id,
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS total_runs,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "player_out_id" IN (p1_id, p2_id) AND "wicket_type" NOT IN ('retired hurt', 'obstructing the field', 'retired out') THEN 1 END) AS dismissals
  FROM PartnershipDeliveries
  GROUP BY
    p1_id,
    p2_id
)
SELECT
  p1."player_name",
  p2."player_name",
  CAST(ps.total_runs AS REAL) / ps.dismissals AS "Partnership Average"
FROM PartnershipStats AS ps
JOIN "Players" AS p1
  ON ps.p1_id = p1."player_id"
JOIN "Players" AS p2
  ON ps.p2_id = p2."player_id"
WHERE
  ps.total_runs >= 1000 AND ps.dismissals > 0
ORDER BY
  "Partnership Average" DESC
LIMIT 4;
question_english: top 4 Highest partnership average in ipl with minimum 1000 runs.
question_hindi_1: IPL में सबसे ज़्यादा साझेदारी औसत वाली शीर्ष 4 जोड़ियाँ (न्यूनतम 1000 रन)।
question_telugu_1: IPL లో అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ పార్ట్నర్షిప్ ఆవెరేజ్ ఉన్న 4 జతలు (కనీసం 1000 పరుగులు) ఏమిటి?

question: highest average for a batsman in powerplay with minimum 20 innnings.
query: SELECT T2."player_name", CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS REAL) / NULLIF(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1."player_out_id" = T1."striker_id" AND T1."wicket_type" NOT IN ('retired hurt', 'obstructing the field') THEN 1 END), 0) AS "average" FROM "Deliveries" AS T1 INNER JOIN "Players" AS T2 ON T1."striker_id" = T2."player_id" WHERE T1."over_number" <= 5 GROUP BY T2."player_name" HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT T1."match_id") >= 20 ORDER BY "average" DESC LIMIT 1
question_english: highest average for a batsman in powerplay with minimum 20 innnings.

question: highest partnership for lsg for 2nd wicket or lower.
query:
WITH PartnershipData AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "striker_id",
    "non_striker_id",
    "runs_scored" + "extra_runs" AS total_runs,
    SUM(CASE WHEN "player_out_id" IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number" ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING) AS wicket_group
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "batting_team" = 'Lucknow Super Giants'
), PartnershipPairs AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    wicket_group,
    MIN("striker_id") AS p1_id,
    MAX("striker_id") AS p2_id,
    SUM(total_runs) AS partnership_runs
  FROM PartnershipData
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    wicket_group
)
SELECT
  T2."player_name",
  T3."player_name",
  T1.partnership_runs
FROM PartnershipPairs AS T1
JOIN "Players" AS T2
  ON T1.p1_id = T2."player_id"
JOIN "Players" AS T3
  ON T1.p2_id = T3."player_id"
WHERE
  T1.wicket_group >= 1
ORDER BY
  T1.partnership_runs DESC
LIMIT 1;
question_english: highest partnership for lsg for 2nd wicket or lower.
question_hindi_1: LSG के लिए दूसरे विकेट या उसके बाद की सबसे बड़ी साझेदारी।
question_telugu_1: LSG యొక్క రెండవ వికెట్ లేదా దాని తరువాత అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ పార్ట్నర్షిప్ ఏమిటి?
question_punjabi: LSG ਲਈ ਦੂਜੀ ਵਿਕਟ ਜਾਂ ਉਸ ਤੋਂ ਹੇਠਾਂ ਲਈ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਡੀ ਸਾਂਝੇਦਾਰੀ।

question: the 3 batsmen to Reach 50 in 25 or fewer balls most times in a season
query:
WITH BatsmanInnings AS (
  SELECT
    T1."match_id",
    T1."striker_id",
    T2."season",
    SUM(T1."runs_scored") OVER (
      PARTITION BY
        T1."match_id",
        T1."striker_id"
      ORDER BY
        T1."inning",
        T1."over_number",
        T1."ball_number"
    ) AS "cumulative_runs",
    SUM(
      CASE WHEN NOT (
        T1."extra_runs" > 0
        AND T1."runs_scored" = 0
        AND T1."wicket_type" IS NULL
      ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
    ) OVER (
      PARTITION BY
        T1."match_id",
        T1."striker_id"
      ORDER BY
        T1."inning",
        T1."over_number",
        T1."ball_number"
    ) AS "cumulative_balls_faced"
  FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
  INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
), BallsToFifty AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "striker_id",
    "season",
    MIN("cumulative_balls_faced") AS "balls_taken"
  FROM BatsmanInnings
  WHERE
    "cumulative_runs" >= 50
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "striker_id",
    "season"
), FastFifties AS (
  SELECT
    "striker_id",
    "season"
  FROM BallsToFifty
  WHERE
    "balls_taken" <= 25
), SeasonCounts AS (
  SELECT
    "striker_id",
    "season",
    COUNT(*) AS "num_fast_fifties"
  FROM FastFifties
  GROUP BY
    "striker_id",
    "season"
)
SELECT
  T2."player_name",
  T1."season",
  T1."num_fast_fifties"
FROM SeasonCounts AS T1
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T2
  ON T1."striker_id" = T2."player_id"
ORDER BY
  T1."num_fast_fifties" DESC
LIMIT 3;
question_english: the 3 batsmen to Reach 50 in 25 or fewer balls most times in a season

question: most players to score 500+ runs in a single season
query:
WITH "PlayerRuns" AS (
  SELECT
    T2."season",
    T1."striker_id"
  FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
  INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
  GROUP BY
    T2."season",
    T1."striker_id"
  HAVING
    SUM(T1."runs_scored") >= 500
)
SELECT
  "season",
  COUNT("striker_id") AS "num_players"
FROM "PlayerRuns"
GROUP BY
  "season"
ORDER BY
  "num_players" DESC
LIMIT 1;
question_english: most players to score 500+ runs in a single season
question_hindi_1: एक सीज़न में 500+ रन बनाने वाले सबसे ज़्यादा खिलाड़ी
question_hindi_2: एक ही सीज़न में 500 से ज़्यादा रन बनाने वाले सर्वाधिक खिलाड़ी
question_telugu_1: ఒక సీజన్లో 500 లేదా దానికన్నా ఎక్కువ పరుగులు సాధించిన అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ క్రీడాకార్లు ఎవరు?
question_punjabi: ਇੱਕ ਸੀਜ਼ਨ ਜਿਦੇ ਵਿੱਚ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਖਿਡਾਰੀਆਂ ਨੇ 500+ ਰੰਨਾਂ ਦਾ ਰਿਕਾਰਡ ਬਣਾਏ।

question: top 5 most wins against a team tally
query:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN "match_winner" IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings')
    THEN 'Punjab Kings'
    WHEN "match_winner" IN ('Delhi Daredevils', 'Delhi Capitals')
    THEN 'Delhi Capitals'
    WHEN "match_winner" IN ('Deccan Chargers', 'Sunrisers Hyderabad')
    THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'
    WHEN "match_winner" IN ('Pune Warriors', 'Rising Pune Supergiant', 'Rising Pune Supergiants')
    THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant'
    WHEN "match_winner" IN ('Royal Challengers Bangalore', 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru')
    THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
    ELSE "match_winner"
  END AS "winning_team",
  CASE
    WHEN CASE
      WHEN "team1" = "match_winner"
      THEN "team2"
      ELSE "team1"
    END IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings')
    THEN 'Punjab Kings'
    WHEN CASE
      WHEN "team1" = "match_winner"
      THEN "team2"
      ELSE "team1"
    END IN ('Delhi Daredevils', 'Delhi Capitals')
    THEN 'Delhi Capitals'
    WHEN CASE
      WHEN "team1" = "match_winner"
      THEN "team2"
      ELSE "team1"
    END IN ('Deccan Chargers', 'Sunrisers Hyderabad')
    THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'
    WHEN CASE
      WHEN "team1" = "match_winner"
      THEN "team2"
      ELSE "team1"
    END IN ('Pune Warriors', 'Rising Pune Supergiant', 'Rising Pune Supergiants')
    THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant'
    WHEN CASE
      WHEN "team1" = "match_winner"
      THEN "team2"
      ELSE "team1"
    END IN ('Royal Challengers Bangalore', 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru')
    THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
    ELSE CASE
      WHEN "team1" = "match_winner"
      THEN "team2"
      ELSE "team1"
    END
  END AS "losing_team",
  COUNT(*) AS "wins"
FROM "Matches"
WHERE
  "match_winner" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
  "winning_team",
  "losing_team"
ORDER BY
  "wins" DESC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: top 5 most wins against a team tally

question: list the instances of a team that has failed to qualify for playoffs after winning each of their first four games.
query: WITH TeamWins AS (SELECT T1.season, T1.team FROM (SELECT season, match_date, team, match_winner, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY season, team ORDER BY match_date) AS match_num FROM (SELECT "season", "match_date", "team1" AS team, "match_winner" FROM Matches UNION ALL SELECT "season", "match_date", "team2" AS team, "match_winner" FROM Matches)) AS T1 WHERE T1.match_num <= 4 AND T1.team = T1.match_winner GROUP BY T1.season, T1.team HAVING COUNT(T1.team) = 4), PlayoffTeams AS (SELECT DISTINCT "season", "team1" AS team FROM Matches WHERE "stage" != 'Group' UNION SELECT DISTINCT "season", "team2" AS team FROM Matches WHERE "stage" != 'Group') SELECT T2.season, T2.team FROM TeamWins AS T2 LEFT JOIN PlayoffTeams AS T3 ON T2.season = T3.season AND T2.team = T3.team WHERE T3.team IS NULL
question_english: list the instances of a team that has failed to qualify for playoffs after winning each of their first four games.
question_hindi_1: उन टीमों की सूची दें, जो अपने शुरुआती चारों मैच जीतने के बावजूद प्लेऑफ़ के लिए क्वालीफाई नहीं कर पाईं।
question_hindi_2: ऐसी टीमों के उदाहरण दें, जो अपने पहले चार मैच जीतने के बाद भी प्लेऑफ़ में जगह नहीं बना सकीं।
question_telugu_1: మొదటి నాలుగు మ్యాచ్‌లు ఓడిపోయి ప్లేఆఫ్సకు అర్హత సాదించని టీం వివరాలు ఏమిటి?
question_punjabi: ਉਹ ਟੀਮਾਂ ਜੋ ਆਪਣੇ ਪਹਿਲੇ ਚਾਰ ਮੈਚ ਜਿੱਤਣ ਦੇ ਬਾਵਜੂਦ ਪਲੇਅ-ਔਫ ਲਈ ਕੁਆਲੀਫਾਈ ਨਹੀਂ ਕਰ ਸਕੀਆਂ।

question: list the top 5 instances of most runs scored by mi in last 2 overs.list the opponent and the venue alongwith runs scored.
query:
SELECT
  SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") AS total_runs,
  T1."bowling_team",
  T2."venue"
FROM Deliveries AS T1
INNER JOIN Matches AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
WHERE
  T1."batting_team" = 'Mumbai Indians' AND T1."over_number" >= 18
GROUP BY
  T1."match_id",
  T1."inning"
ORDER BY
  total_runs DESC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: list the top 5 instances of most runs scored by mi in last 2 overs.list the opponent and the venue alongwith runs scored.
question_hindi_1: MI द्वारा आखिरी 2 ओवरों में बनाए गए सबसे ज़्यादा रनों के टॉप 5 मौकों की सूची दें। इसमें विपक्षी टीम, वेन्यू (मैदान) और बनाए गए रन भी बताएं।
question_telugu_1: చివరి 2 ఓవర్లలో MI అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ పరుగులు సాధించిన టాప్ 5 సంధర్భాల ఏమిటి? సాధించిన పరుగులతో పాటు వేరే టీం మరియు వేదిక కూడా రాయండి.
question_punjabi: ਆਖਰੀ 2 ਓਵਰਾਂ ਵਿੱਚ MI ਦੁਆਰਾ ਬਣਾਏ ਗਏ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਰਨ ਦੇ ਚੋਟੀ ਦੇ 5 ਮੌਕਿਆਂ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਦਿਓ। ਵਿਰੋਧੀ ਟੀਮ ਅਤੇ ਸਥਾਨ ਦੇ ਨਾਮ ਦੇ ਨਾਲ ਬਣਾਏ ਗਏ ਰਨ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਵੀ ਦਿਓ।

question: highest average by a player against any opponent with atleat 500 runs against them. list the runs strike rate and average.
query: SELECT T2."player_name", CASE WHEN T1."bowling_team" IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings') THEN 'Punjab Kings' WHEN T1."bowling_team" IN ('Deccan Chargers', 'Sunrisers Hyderabad') THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad' WHEN T1."bowling_team" IN ('Delhi Daredevils', 'Delhi Capitals') THEN 'Delhi Capitals' WHEN T1."bowling_team" IN ('Pune Warriors', 'Rising Pune Supergiant', 'Rising Pune Supergiants') THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant' WHEN T1."bowling_team" IN ('Royal Challengers Bangalore', 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru') THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru' ELSE T1."bowling_team" END AS "opponent", SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS "total_runs", CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(CASE WHEN NOT (T1."extra_runs" > 0 AND T1."runs_scored" = 0 AND T1."wicket_type" IS NULL) THEN 1 END) AS "strike_rate", CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS REAL) / COUNT(CASE WHEN T1."player_out_id" = T1."striker_id" AND T1."wicket_type" NOT IN ('retired hurt', 'obstructing the field') THEN 1 END) AS "average" FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1."striker_id" = T2."player_id" GROUP BY T2."player_name", "opponent" HAVING SUM(T1."runs_scored") >= 500 AND COUNT(CASE WHEN T1."player_out_id" = T1."striker_id" AND T1."wicket_type" NOT IN ('retired hurt', 'obstructing the field') THEN 1 END) > 0 ORDER BY "average" DESC LIMIT 1
question_english: highest average by a player against any opponent with atleat 500 runs against them. list the runs strike rate and average.
question_hindi_1: किसी भी विपक्षी टीम के खिलाफ सबसे ज़्यादा औसत किस खिलाड़ी का है? (न्यूनतम 500 रन)। रन, स्ट्राइक रेट और औसत भी बताएं।
question_hindi_2: किसी एक विपक्षी टीम के खिलाफ किसी खिलाड़ी का सर्वोच्च बल्लेबाजी औसत, जिसने उस टीम के खिलाफ कम से कम 500 रन बनाए हों। रन, स्ट्राइक रेट और औसत की सूची दें।
question_telugu_1: ఒక ప్రత్యర్థి జట్టుకు వ్యతిరేకంగా అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ ఆవెరేజ్ ఏ క్రీడాకారుడి (కనీసం 500 పరుగులు)? పరుగులు, స్ట్రైక్ రేట్ మరియు ఆవెరేజ్ రాయండి.
question_punjabi: ਕਿਸੇ ਵੀ ਵਿਰੋਧੀ ਟੀਮ ਦੇ ਖਿਲਾਫ ਘੱਟੋ-ਘੱਟ 500 ਰਨ ਬਣਾਉਣ ਵਾਲੇ ਖਿਡਾਰੀ ਦੀ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਬੱਲੇਬਾਜ਼ੀ ਔਸਤ ਦਿਖਾਓ। ਰਨ , ਸਟ੍ਰਾਈਕ ਰੇਟ ਅਤੇ ਔਸਤ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਵੀ ਦਿਓ।

question: kl rahul record against mumbai.list his total runs strike rate and average.
query: SELECT SUM(T2."runs_scored"), CAST(SUM(T2."runs_scored") AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(CASE WHEN NOT (T2."extra_runs" > 0 AND T2."runs_scored" = 0 AND T2."wicket_type" IS NULL) THEN 1 END), CAST(SUM(T2."runs_scored") AS REAL) / COUNT(CASE WHEN T2."player_out_id" = T1."player_id" AND T2."wicket_type" NOT IN ('retired hurt', 'obstructing the field') THEN 1 END) FROM Players AS T1 INNER JOIN Deliveries AS T2 ON T1."player_id" = T2."striker_id" WHERE T1."player_name" LIKE 'KL Rahul%' AND T2."bowling_team" = 'Mumbai Indians'
question_english: kl rahul record against mumbai.list his total runs strike rate and average.

question: CSK record while defending in ipl 2025.
query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN "match_winner" = 'Chennai Super Kings' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Wins", SUM(CASE WHEN "match_winner" != 'Chennai Super Kings' AND "match_winner" IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Losses" FROM "Matches" WHERE "season" = '2025' AND ("team1" = 'Chennai Super Kings' OR "team2" = 'Chennai Super Kings') AND (("toss_winner" = 'Chennai Super Kings' AND "toss_decision" = 'bat') OR ("toss_winner" != 'Chennai Super Kings' AND "toss_decision" = 'field'))

question: Top 4 Highest SR for a batter in an IPL season (min. 100 balls faced)
query:
SELECT
  T2.player_name,
  T3.season,
  CAST(SUM(T1.runs_scored) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(CASE WHEN NOT (T1.extra_runs > 0 AND T1.runs_scored = 0 AND T1.wicket_type IS NULL) THEN 1 END) AS "StrikeRate"
FROM Deliveries AS T1
INNER JOIN Players AS T2
  ON T1.striker_id = T2.player_id
INNER JOIN Matches AS T3
  ON T1.match_id = T3.match_id
GROUP BY
  T2.player_name,
  T3.season
HAVING
  COUNT(CASE WHEN NOT (T1.extra_runs > 0 AND T1.runs_scored = 0 AND T1.wicket_type IS NULL) THEN 1 END) >= 100
ORDER BY
  "StrikeRate" DESC
LIMIT 4;
question_english: Top 4 Highest SR for a batter in an IPL season (min. 100 balls faced)
question_hindi_1: IPL के किसी सीज़न में एक बल्लेबाज़ का टॉप 4 सबसे ज़्यादा स्ट्राइक रेट (कम से कम 100 गेंदें खेली हों)

question_punjabi: ਇੱਕ IPL ਸੀਜ਼ਨ ਵਿੱਚ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਸਟ੍ਰਾਈਕ ਰੇਟ ਵਾਲੇ ਚੋਟੀ ਦੇ 4 ਬੱਲੇਬਾਜ਼ (ਘੱਟੋ-ਘੱਟ 100 ਗੇਂਦਾਂ ਖੇਡੀਆਂ ਹੋਣ)

question: top 5 teams with most sixes in powerplay in ipl 2025.
query: SELECT T1."batting_team", COUNT(T1."runs_scored") FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Matches AS T2 ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" WHERE T2."season" = '2025' AND T1."runs_scored" = 6 AND T1."over_number" <= 5 GROUP BY T1."batting_team" ORDER BY COUNT(T1."runs_scored") DESC LIMIT 5
question_english: top 5 teams with most sixes in powerplay in ipl 2025.
question_hindi_1: *आईपीएल 2025 में पावरप्ले में सबसे ज़्यादा छक्के लगाने वाली टॉप 5 टीमें।**
question_telugu_1: IPL 2025 లో పవర్ప్లే లో అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ సిక్సులు ఆడిన టాప్ 5 టిములు ఎవరు?
question_punjabi: IPL 2025 ਦੇ ਪਾਵਰਪਲੇ ਵਿੱਚ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਛੱਕੇ ਲਗਾਉਣ ਵਾਲੀਆਂ ਚੋਟੀ ਦੀਆਂ 5 ਟੀਮਾਂ।

question: list every team's runrate and boundary percentage in powerplay in ipl 2025..
query:
SELECT
  T1."batting_team",
  CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") AS REAL) * 6 / COUNT(T1."delivery_id") AS "run_rate",
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1."runs_scored" IN (4, 6) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1."delivery_id") AS "boundary_percentage"
FROM Deliveries AS T1
INNER JOIN Matches AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
WHERE
  T2."season" = '2025' AND T1."over_number" <= 5
GROUP BY
  T1."batting_team"
ORDER BY
  run_rate DESC;
question_english: list every team's runrate and boundary percentage in powerplay in ipl 2025..
question_hindi_1: आईपीएल 2025 में, पावरप्ले में हर टीम का रन रेट और बाउंड्री प्रतिशत बताएं।

question: most sixes by a player in powerplay of ipl 2025 with the balls faced by them in powerplay this season.list the top 5
query: SELECT T2.player_name, COUNT(T1.delivery_id), SUM(CASE WHEN T1.runs_scored = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1.striker_id = T2.player_id INNER JOIN Matches AS T3 ON T1.match_id = T3.match_id WHERE T3.season = '2025' AND T1.over_number <= 5 GROUP BY T2.player_name ORDER BY SUM(CASE WHEN T1.runs_scored = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) DESC LIMIT 5
question_english: most sixes by a player in powerplay of ipl 2025 with the balls faced by them in powerplay this season.list the top 5

question_telugu_1: IPL 2025 యొక్క పవర్ప్లే లో అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ సిక్సులు ఆడిన 5 బ్యాట్స్మెన్ ఎవరు? దానితో పాటు వాళ్ళ తరపన ఈ సీజన్ యొక్క పవర్ప్లే లో ఆడిన బంతులు సంఖ్యని రాయండి.

question: Best SR in middle Overs in IPL 2025 (min. 75 balls faced). list the top 5.
query: SELECT T2."player_name", CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(CASE WHEN NOT (T1."extra_runs" > 0 AND T1."runs_scored" = 0 AND T1."wicket_type" IS NULL) THEN 1 END) AS "strike_rate" FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1."striker_id" = T2."player_id" INNER JOIN Matches AS T3 ON T1."match_id" = T3."match_id" WHERE T3."season" = '2025' AND T1."over_number" BETWEEN 6 AND 14 GROUP BY T2."player_name" HAVING COUNT(CASE WHEN NOT (T1."extra_runs" > 0 AND T1."runs_scored" = 0 AND T1."wicket_type" IS NULL) THEN 1 END) >= 75 ORDER BY "strike_rate" DESC LIMIT 5

question: list the number of times each team has chased a total of 200 or more.
query:
WITH Inning1Scores AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS "inning1_total"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "inning" = 1
  GROUP BY
    "match_id"
), ChasingTeams AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    "match_id",
    "batting_team"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "inning" = 2
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN T1.match_winner IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings')
    THEN 'Punjab Kings'
    WHEN T1.match_winner IN ('Deccan Chargers', 'Sunrisers Hyderabad')
    THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'
    WHEN T1.match_winner IN ('Delhi Daredevils', 'Delhi Capitals')
    THEN 'Delhi Capitals'
    WHEN T1.match_winner IN ('Pune Warriors', 'Rising Pune Supergiant', 'Rising Pune Supergiants')
    THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant'
    WHEN T1.match_winner IN ('Royal Challengers Bangalore', 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru')
    THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
    ELSE T1.match_winner
  END AS "team_name",
  COUNT(T1.match_id) AS "successful_chases"
FROM Matches AS T1
JOIN Inning1Scores AS T2
  ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id
JOIN ChasingTeams AS T3
  ON T1.match_id = T3.match_id
WHERE
  T1.match_winner = T3.batting_team AND T2.inning1_total >= 199
GROUP BY
  "team_name"
ORDER BY
  "successful_chases" DESC;
question_english: list the number of times each team has chased a total of 200 or more.
question_hindi_1: हर टीम ने कितनी बार 200 या उससे ज़्यादा का स्कोर चेज़ किया है?
question_hindi_2: हर टीम ने कितनी बार 200 या उससे ज़्यादा रनों के लक्ष्य का सफलतापूर्वक पीछा किया है?

question_punjabi: ਹਰੇਕ ਟੀਮ ਨੇ ਕਿੰਨੀ ਵਾਰ 200 ਜਾਂ ਇਸ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਦੇ target ਦਾ ਸਫਲਤਾਪੂਰਵਕ ਪਿੱਛਾ ਕੀਤਾ ਹੈ, ਉਸ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਦਿਓ।

question: player Reaching 50 in fewer than 20 balls most times in IPL.list the top 4
query:
WITH CumulativeStats AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "striker_id",
    SUM("runs_scored") OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning", "striker_id" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS "cumulative_runs",
    COUNT(CASE WHEN NOT ("extra_runs" > 0 AND "runs_scored" = 0 AND "wicket_type" IS NULL) THEN 1 END) OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning", "striker_id" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS "balls_faced"
  FROM "Deliveries"
), InningsFifty AS (
  SELECT
    "striker_id",
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    MIN("balls_faced") AS "balls_to_reach_50"
  FROM CumulativeStats
  WHERE
    "cumulative_runs" >= 50
  GROUP BY
    "striker_id",
    "match_id",
    "inning"
)
SELECT
  T2."player_name",
  COUNT(T1."striker_id") AS "fast_fifties_count"
FROM InningsFifty AS T1
JOIN "Players" AS T2
  ON T1."striker_id" = T2."player_id"
WHERE
  T1."balls_to_reach_50" < 20
GROUP BY
  T2."player_name"
ORDER BY
  "fast_fifties_count" DESC
LIMIT 4;
question_english: player Reaching 50 in fewer than 20 balls most times in IPL.list the top 4
question_hindi_1: IPL में 20 गेंदों से कम में सबसे ज़्यादा बार 50 रन बनाने वाले टॉप 4 खिलाड़ी।

question: top 4 highest powerplay scores in lucknow in ipl.give the teams involved and the year
query: SELECT T1.season, T1.team1, T1.team2, T2.batting_team, SUM(T2.runs_scored + T2.extra_runs) AS total_runs FROM Matches AS T1 INNER JOIN Deliveries AS T2 ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id WHERE T1.city = 'Lucknow' AND T2.over_number <= 5 GROUP BY T1.match_id, T2.batting_team ORDER BY total_runs DESC LIMIT 4

question: how many balls did tm head take to get to his fifty in the match of rr and srh in 2025
query: WITH PlayerInnings AS (SELECT SUM(T1.runs_scored) OVER (ORDER BY T1.over_number, T1.ball_number) AS cumulative_runs, SUM(CASE WHEN T1.wides = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (ORDER BY T1.over_number, T1.ball_number) AS balls_faced FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Matches AS T2 ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id INNER JOIN Players AS T3 ON T1.striker_id = T3.player_id WHERE T3.player_name LIKE 'TM Head%' AND T2.season = '2025' AND ((CASE WHEN T2.team1 = 'Deccan Chargers' THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad' ELSE T2.team1 END = 'Sunrisers Hyderabad' AND T2.team2 = 'Rajasthan Royals') OR (T2.team1 = 'Rajasthan Royals' AND CASE WHEN T2.team2 = 'Deccan Chargers' THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad' ELSE T2.team2 END = 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'))) SELECT balls_faced FROM PlayerInnings WHERE cumulative_runs >= 50 LIMIT 1
