question: list all instances of 100+ opening stands for lsg.the total runs and the batters involved
query:
WITH FirstWicket AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    MIN("delivery_id") AS first_wicket_delivery_id
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "wicket_type" IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "inning"
), OpeningPartnershipRuns AS (
  SELECT
    T1."match_id",
    T1."inning",
    T1."batting_team",
    SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") AS partnership_runs
  FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
  LEFT JOIN FirstWicket AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
    AND T1."inning" = T2."inning"
  WHERE
    T2.first_wicket_delivery_id IS NULL
    OR T1."delivery_id" < T2.first_wicket_delivery_id
  GROUP BY
    T1."match_id",
    T1."inning",
    T1."batting_team"
), OpeningBatsmen AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "striker_id",
    "non_striker_id"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "delivery_id" IN (
      SELECT
        MIN("delivery_id")
      FROM "Deliveries"
      GROUP BY
        "match_id",
        "inning"
    )
)
SELECT
  T1.partnership_runs,
  T3."player_name",
  T4."player_name"
FROM OpeningPartnershipRuns AS T1
INNER JOIN OpeningBatsmen AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
  AND T1."inning" = T2."inning"
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T3
  ON T2."striker_id" = T3."player_id"
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T4
  ON T2."non_striker_id" = T4."player_id"
WHERE
  T1.batting_team = 'Lucknow Super Giants' AND T1.partnership_runs >= 100
ORDER BY
  T1.partnership_runs DESC;
question_english: list all instances of 100+ opening stands for lsg.the total runs and the batters involved
question_hindi_1: LSG के लिए 100+ रनों की सभी ओपनिंग साझेदारियों की सूची दें, जिसमें कुल रन और शामिल बल्लेबाज़ों के नाम भी बताएं।

question: highest partnership to get a 10-wicket win in ipl
query:
WITH TenWicketWinMatches AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "match_winner"
  FROM "Matches"
  WHERE
    "result_type" = 'wickets' AND "result_margin" = 10
), PartnershipRuns AS (
  SELECT
    T1."match_id",
    SUM(T2."runs_scored" + T2."extra_runs") AS total_runs
  FROM TenWicketWinMatches AS T1
  JOIN "Deliveries" AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
  WHERE
    T2."batting_team" = T1."match_winner"
  GROUP BY
    T1."match_id"
), Partners AS (
  SELECT
    T1."match_id",
    T2."striker_id" AS player_id
  FROM TenWicketWinMatches AS T1
  JOIN "Deliveries" AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
  WHERE
    T2."batting_team" = T1."match_winner"
  UNION
  SELECT
    T1."match_id",
    T2."non_striker_id" AS player_id
  FROM TenWicketWinMatches AS T1
  JOIN "Deliveries" AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
  WHERE
    T2."batting_team" = T1."match_winner"
)
SELECT
  T2."total_runs",
  GROUP_CONCAT(T4."player_name", ' and ') AS partnership_players
FROM Partners AS T1
JOIN PartnershipRuns AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
JOIN "Players" AS T4
  ON T1."player_id" = T4."player_id"
GROUP BY
  T1."match_id"
ORDER BY
  T2."total_runs" DESC
LIMIT 1;
question_english: highest partnership to get a 10-wicket win in ipl
question_hindi_1: IPL में 10 विकेट से जीत के लिए सबसे बड़ी साझेदारी।
question_telugu_1: IPL లో 10 విక్కెట్లతో గెలుపులో అన్నిటికన్నా పెద్ద భాగస్వామ్యం ఏమిటి?

question: list the 4 highest run chases vs delhi
query:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN T1."batting_team" = 'Kings XI Punjab' THEN 'Punjab Kings'
    WHEN T1."batting_team" = 'Deccan Chargers' THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'
    WHEN T1."batting_team" = 'Pune Warriors' THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant'
    WHEN T1."batting_team" = 'Rising Pune Supergiants' THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant'
    WHEN T1."batting_team" = 'Delhi Daredevils' THEN 'Delhi Capitals'
    WHEN T1."batting_team" = 'Royal Challengers Bangalore' THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
    ELSE T1."batting_team"
  END,
  SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs")
FROM Deliveries AS T1
INNER JOIN Matches AS T2
  ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id
WHERE
  T1.inning = 2 AND T2.match_winner = T1.batting_team AND CASE
    WHEN T1."bowling_team" = 'Kings XI Punjab' THEN 'Punjab Kings'
    WHEN T1."bowling_team" = 'Deccan Chargers' THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'
    WHEN T1."bowling_team" = 'Pune Warriors' THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant'
    WHEN T1."bowling_team" = 'Rising Pune Supergiants' THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant'
    WHEN T1."bowling_team" = 'Delhi Daredevils' THEN 'Delhi Capitals'
    WHEN T1."bowling_team" = 'Royal Challengers Bangalore' THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
    ELSE T1."bowling_team"
  END = 'Delhi Capitals'
GROUP BY
  T1.match_id
ORDER BY
  SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") DESC
LIMIT 4;
question_english: list the 4 highest run chases vs delhi
question_hindi_1: दिल्ली के खिलाफ़ 4 सबसे सफल रन चेज़ बताइए।

question: list all 200+ opening stands in ipl
query:
WITH FirstWicket AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    MIN("delivery_id") AS first_wicket_delivery
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "wicket_type" IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "inning"
), OpeningPartnershipRuns AS (
  SELECT
    T1."match_id",
    T1."inning",
    SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") AS runs
  FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
  LEFT JOIN FirstWicket AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
    AND T1."inning" = T2."inning"
  WHERE
    T2.first_wicket_delivery IS NULL
    OR T1."delivery_id" < T2.first_wicket_delivery
  GROUP BY
    T1."match_id",
    T1."inning"
  HAVING
    runs >= 200
)
SELECT
  T4."player_name",
  T5."player_name",
  T1.runs,
  T6."venue",
  T6."match_date"
FROM OpeningPartnershipRuns AS T1
INNER JOIN "Deliveries" AS T3
  ON T1."match_id" = T3."match_id"
  AND T1."inning" = T3."inning"
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T4
  ON T3."striker_id" = T4."player_id"
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T5
  ON T3."non_striker_id" = T5."player_id"
INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T6
  ON T1."match_id" = T6."match_id"
WHERE
  T3."over_number" = 0 AND T3."ball_number" = 1
ORDER BY
  T1.runs DESC;

question: the 2 highest opening stands against dc
query:
WITH FirstWicket AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    MIN("delivery_id") AS first_wicket_delivery
  FROM Deliveries
  WHERE
    "player_out_id" IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "inning"
)
SELECT
  "batting_team",
  SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS partnership_runs
FROM Deliveries
LEFT JOIN FirstWicket
  ON Deliveries.match_id = FirstWicket.match_id AND Deliveries.inning = FirstWicket.inning
WHERE
  (
    CASE
      WHEN "bowling_team" IN ('Delhi Daredevils', 'Delhi Capitals')
      THEN 'Delhi Capitals'
      ELSE "bowling_team"
    END
  ) = 'Delhi Capitals'
  AND (
    Deliveries.delivery_id < FirstWicket.first_wicket_delivery
    OR FirstWicket.first_wicket_delivery IS NULL
  )
GROUP BY
  Deliveries.match_id,
  Deliveries.inning
ORDER BY
  partnership_runs DESC
LIMIT 2;

question: the 5 most 100+ partnerships for a pair
query:
WITH PartnershipRuns AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    CASE WHEN "striker_id" < "non_striker_id" THEN "striker_id" ELSE "non_striker_id" END AS player1_id,
    CASE WHEN "striker_id" < "non_striker_id" THEN "non_striker_id" ELSE "striker_id" END AS player2_id,
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS partnership_runs
  FROM "Deliveries"
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    player1_id,
    player2_id
  HAVING
    partnership_runs >= 100
)
SELECT
  p1."player_name",
  p2."player_name",
  COUNT(*) AS "num_100_plus_partnerships"
FROM PartnershipRuns AS pr
JOIN "Players" AS p1
  ON pr.player1_id = p1."player_id"
JOIN "Players" AS p2
  ON pr.player2_id = p2."player_id"
GROUP BY
  p1."player_name",
  p2."player_name"
ORDER BY
  "num_100_plus_partnerships" DESC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: the 5 most 100+ partnerships for a pair

question: Most opening stands of more than 50 by a pair in an IPL season
query:
WITH FirstWicket AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    MIN("delivery_id") AS first_wicket_delivery
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "player_out_id" IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "inning"
), OpeningPartnershipRuns AS (
  SELECT
    T1."match_id",
    T1."inning",
    SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."extra_runs") AS partnership_runs
  FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
  LEFT JOIN FirstWicket AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
    AND T1."inning" = T2."inning"
  WHERE
    T1."delivery_id" < T2.first_wicket_delivery OR T2.first_wicket_delivery IS NULL
  GROUP BY
    T1."match_id",
    T1."inning"
), OpeningPairs AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    CASE WHEN "striker_id" < "non_striker_id" THEN "striker_id" ELSE "non_striker_id" END AS player1_id,
    CASE WHEN "striker_id" < "non_striker_id" THEN "non_striker_id" ELSE "striker_id" END AS player2_id
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "over_number" = 0 AND "ball_number" = 1
)
SELECT
  T5."player_name",
  T6."player_name",
  T4."season",
  COUNT(T3."match_id") AS num_50_plus_stands
FROM OpeningPartnershipRuns AS T3
INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T4
  ON T3."match_id" = T4."match_id"
INNER JOIN OpeningPairs AS T7
  ON T3."match_id" = T7."match_id"
  AND T3."inning" = T7."inning"
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T5
  ON T7.player1_id = T5."player_id"
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T6
  ON T7.player2_id = T6."player_id"
WHERE
  T3.partnership_runs > 50
GROUP BY
  T4."season",
  T5."player_name",
  T6."player_name"
ORDER BY
  num_50_plus_stands DESC
LIMIT 1;
question_english: Most opening stands of more than 50 by a pair in an IPL season
question_hindi_1: एक IPL सीज़न में किसी जोड़ी द्वारा सबसे ज़्यादा 50+ रन की ओपनिंग पार्टनरशिप।

question: show kl rahul's innings progression afteer every 20 balls in dc vs gt in which he made a century in ipl 2025
query:
WITH PlayerInnings AS (
  SELECT
    "runs_scored",
    SUM(CASE WHEN "wides" = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (
      ORDER BY
        "over_number",
        "ball_number"
    ) AS "cumulative_balls_faced",
    SUM("runs_scored") OVER (
      ORDER BY
        "over_number",
        "ball_number"
    ) AS "cumulative_runs_scored"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "striker_id" = (
      SELECT
        "player_id"
      FROM "Players"
      WHERE
        "player_name" LIKE 'KL Rahul%'
    ) AND "match_id" = (
      SELECT
        T1."match_id"
      FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
      INNER JOIN "Players" AS T2
        ON T1."striker_id" = T2."player_id"
      INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T3
        ON T1."match_id" = T3."match_id"
      WHERE
        T2."player_name" LIKE 'KL Rahul%' AND T3."season" = '2025' AND (
          (
            (
              CASE
                WHEN T3."team1" IN ('Delhi Daredevils', 'Delhi Capitals')
                THEN 'Delhi Capitals'
                ELSE T3."team1"
              END
            ) = 'Delhi Capitals' AND T3."team2" = 'Gujarat Titans'
          ) OR (
            T3."team1" = 'Gujarat Titans' AND (
              CASE
                WHEN T3."team2" IN ('Delhi Daredevils', 'Delhi Capitals')
                THEN 'Delhi Capitals'
                ELSE T3."team2"
              END
            ) = 'Delhi Capitals'
          )
        )
      GROUP BY
        T1."match_id"
      HAVING
        SUM(T1."runs_scored") >= 100
      LIMIT 1
    )
)
SELECT
  MAX("cumulative_balls_faced") AS "balls_faced",
  MAX("cumulative_runs_scored") AS "runs_scored"
FROM PlayerInnings
WHERE
  "cumulative_balls_faced" > 0
GROUP BY
  ("cumulative_balls_faced" - 1) / 20
ORDER BY
  "balls_faced";

question: list the opening batting partnership average of all teams in ipl 2025

question: most defeats batting second in an ipl edition.list all such instances.
query:
WITH DefeatCounts AS (
  SELECT
    "season",
    CASE
      WHEN "toss_decision" = 'field' THEN "toss_winner"
      WHEN "toss_winner" = "team1" THEN "team2"
      ELSE "team1"
    END AS chasing_team,
    "match_winner"
  FROM "Matches"
  WHERE
    "match_winner" IS NOT NULL
), SeasonDefeats AS (
  SELECT
    "season",
    chasing_team,
    COUNT(*) AS num_defeats
  FROM DefeatCounts
  WHERE
    chasing_team <> "match_winner"
  GROUP BY
    "season",
    chasing_team
)
SELECT
  chasing_team,
  "season",
  num_defeats
FROM SeasonDefeats
WHERE
  num_defeats = (
    SELECT
      MAX(num_defeats)
    FROM SeasonDefeats
  )
ORDER BY
  "season";
question_english: most defeats batting second in an ipl edition.list all such instances.

question: the 5 highest average run rates over a season by a team in powerplay.
query:
SELECT
  m.season,
  CASE
    WHEN d.batting_team IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings')
    THEN 'Punjab Kings'
    WHEN d.batting_team IN ('Deccan Chargers', 'Sunrisers Hyderabad')
    THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'
    WHEN d.batting_team IN ('Delhi Daredevils', 'Delhi Capitals')
    THEN 'Delhi Capitals'
    WHEN d.batting_team IN ('Pune Warriors', 'Rising Pune Supergiant', 'Rising Pune Supergiants')
    THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant'
    WHEN d.batting_team IN ('Royal Challengers Bangalore', 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru')
    THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
    ELSE d.batting_team
  END AS franchise,
  SUM(d.runs_scored + d.extra_runs) * 6.0 / COUNT(
    CASE WHEN d.wides = 0 AND d.noballs = 0 THEN 1 END
  ) AS run_rate
FROM Deliveries AS d
JOIN Matches AS m
  ON d.match_id = m.match_id
WHERE
  d.over_number <= 5
GROUP BY
  m.season,
  franchise
ORDER BY
  run_rate DESC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: the 5 highest average run rates over a season by a team in powerplay.

question: fastest team fifty in ipl 2025
query:
WITH MatchProgress AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "batting_team",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "batting_team" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS "cumulative_runs",
    SUM(CASE WHEN "wides" = 0 AND "noballs" = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "batting_team" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS "cumulative_legal_balls"
  FROM "Deliveries"
), FiftyMilestones AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "batting_team",
    "cumulative_legal_balls",
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "batting_team" ORDER BY "cumulative_legal_balls") AS "rn"
  FROM MatchProgress
  WHERE
    "cumulative_runs" >= 50
)
SELECT
  T2."batting_team",
  T2."cumulative_legal_balls" AS "balls_to_reach_50"
FROM "Matches" AS T1
INNER JOIN FiftyMilestones AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
WHERE
  T1."season" = '2025' AND T2."rn" = 1
ORDER BY
  "balls_to_reach_50" ASC
LIMIT 1;
question_english: fastest team fifty in ipl 2025
question_hindi_1: IPL 2025 का सबसे तेज़ टीम पचासा
question_telugu_1: IPL 2025 యొక్క అన్నిటికన్నా వేగమైన టీం 50 ఏమిటి?
question_punjabi: IPL 2025 ਵਿੱਚ ਕਿਸੇ ਟੀਮ ਦੁਆਰਾ ਬਣਾਏ ਗਏ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਤੇਜ਼ 50 ਰਨ|

question: list bowling stats of Fazalhaq Farooqi in IPL 2025
query:
SELECT
  SUM(T1.runs_scored + T1.wides + T1.noballs) AS "Runs Conceded",
  COUNT(
    CASE
      WHEN T1.wicket_type IS NOT NULL AND T1.wicket_type NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field', 'retired out')
      THEN 1
    END
  ) AS "Wickets",
  CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.wides = 0 AND T1.noballs = 0 THEN 1 END) / 6 AS TEXT) || '.' || CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.wides = 0 AND T1.noballs = 0 THEN 1 END) % 6 AS TEXT) AS "Overs Bowled",
  (SUM(T1.runs_scored + T1.wides + T1.noballs) * 6.0) / COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.wides = 0 AND T1.noballs = 0 THEN 1 END) AS "Economy Rate"
FROM Deliveries AS T1
INNER JOIN Players AS T2
  ON T1.bowler_id = T2.player_id
INNER JOIN Matches AS T3
  ON T1.match_id = T3.match_id
WHERE
  T2.player_name LIKE 'Fazalhaq Farooqi%' AND T3.season = '2025';
question_english: list bowling stats of Fazalhaq Farooqi in IPL 2025
question_hindi_1: IPL 2025 में Fazalhaq Farooqi के गेंदबाज़ी के आँकड़े बताएं।
question_telugu_1: IPL 2025 లో Fazalhaq Farooqi యొక్క బౌలింగ్ గణాంకాలు ఏమిటి?
question_punjabi: IPL 2025 ਵਿੱਚ Fazalhaq Farooqi ਦੇ ਗੇਂਦਬਾਜ਼ੀ ਅੰਕੜਿਆਂ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਦਿਓ।

question: list the instance of most runs aggregated by batsmen 4 to 7 in an ipl match
query:
SELECT
  T3."venue",
  T1."batting_team",
  SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS "total_runs"
FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "batting_team",
    "striker_id",
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning", "batting_team" ORDER BY MIN("delivery_id")) AS "batting_position"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "batting_team",
    "striker_id"
) AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
  AND T1."inning" = T2."inning"
  AND T1."batting_team" = T2."batting_team"
  AND T1."striker_id" = T2."striker_id"
INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T3
  ON T1."match_id" = T3."match_id"
WHERE
  T2."batting_position" BETWEEN 4 AND 7
GROUP BY
  T1."match_id",
  T1."inning",
  T1."batting_team"
ORDER BY
  "total_runs" DESC
LIMIT 1;
question_english: list the instance of most runs aggregated by batsmen 4 to 7 in an ipl match
question_hindi_1: किसी IPL मैच में, 4 से 7 नंबर के बल्लेबाज़ों द्वारा मिलकर बनाए गए सर्वाधिक रनों का रिकॉर्ड बताएं।
question_telugu_1: ఒక IPL మ్యాచ్లో 4 నుంచి 7 నెంబర్ బ్యాట్స్మెన్ల మొత్తం పరుగులు ఎప్పుడు అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ ఉన్నది?
question_punjabi: ਕਿਸੇ IPL ਮੈਚ ਵਿੱਚ ਨੰਬਰ 4 ਤੋਂ 7 ਤੱਕ ਦੇ ਬੱਲੇਬਾਜ਼ਾਂ ਦੁਆਰਾ ਬਣਾਏ ਗਏ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਰੰਨਾਂ ਦੇ ਮੌਕਿਆਂ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਦਿਓ।

question: 5 Highest totals after being 3 down for < 35 in an IPL innings
query:
WITH InningsProgress AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    SUM(CASE WHEN "player_out_id" IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS "wickets_down",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS "current_score"
  FROM "Deliveries"
), QualifyingInnings AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    "match_id",
    "inning"
  FROM InningsProgress
  WHERE
    "wickets_down" = 3 AND "current_score" < 35
)
SELECT
  T2."batting_team",
  SUM(T2."runs_scored" + T2."extra_runs") AS "final_total"
FROM QualifyingInnings AS T1
JOIN "Deliveries" AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" AND T1."inning" = T2."inning"
GROUP BY
  T1."match_id",
  T1."inning",
  T2."batting_team"
ORDER BY
  "final_total" DESC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: 5 Highest totals after being 3 down for < 35 in an IPL innings
question_hindi_1: IPL की एक पारी में 35 रन से कम पर 3 विकेट गिरने के बाद 5 सबसे बड़े टोटल।
question_telugu_1: ఒక IPL ఇన్నింగ్స్లో 35 పరుగులు కన్నా తక్కువ ఉన్నప్పుడు 3 వికెట్లు పడిన తర్వాత 5 అన్నిటికన్నా పెద్ద తోటల్స్ ఏమిటి?
question_punjabi: IPL ਦੀ ਇੱਕ ਪਾਰੀ ਵਿੱਚ 35 ਤੋਂ ਘੱਟ ਰੰਨਾਂ ਤੇ 3 ਵਿਕਟਾਂ ਡਿੱਗਣ ਤੋਂ ਬਾਅਦ ਬਣਾਏ ਗਏ 5 ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਡੇ ਸਕੋਰ।

question: list all 200-plus first innings totals in IPL matches in Jaipur
query: SELECT T1.match_id, T1.venue, SUM(T2.runs_scored + T2.extra_runs) AS total_runs FROM Matches AS T1 INNER JOIN Deliveries AS T2 ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id WHERE T1.city = 'Jaipur' AND T2.inning = 1 GROUP BY T1.match_id HAVING SUM(T2.runs_scored + T2.extra_runs) >= 200 ORDER BY total_runs DESC
question_english: list all 200-plus first innings totals in IPL matches in Jaipur
question_hindi_1: *जयपुर में हुए IPL मैचों में, पहली पारी के 200 से ज़्यादा के सभी स्कोर की सूची दें।**
question_telugu_1: జైపూర్లో అయ్యిన IPL మ్యాచులలో మొదటి ఇన్నింగ్స్లో 200 కన్నా ఎక్కువ స్కోర్లు ఏమిటి?
question_punjabi: ਜੈਪੁਰ ਵਿੱਚ ਹੋਏ IPL ਮੈਚਾਂ ਦੀਆਂ ਪਹਿਲੀਆਂ ਪਾਰੀਆਂ ਵਿੱਚ 200 ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਬਣੇ ਸਾਰੇ ਸਕੋਰਾਂ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਦਿਓ।

question: list wadhera's all scores against rr in ipl
query: SELECT SUM(T1.runs_scored), T3.match_date FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1.striker_id = T2.player_id INNER JOIN Matches AS T3 ON T1.match_id = T3.match_id WHERE T2.player_name LIKE 'N Wadhera%' AND T1.bowling_team = 'Rajasthan Royals' GROUP BY T1.match_id
question_english: list wadhera's all scores against rr in ipl
question_hindi_1: IPL में RR के खिलाफ़ वढेरा के सभी स्कोर बताएं।
question_telugu_1: IPL లో RR కి వ్యతిరేకంగా Wadhera యొక్క స్కోర్లు ఏమిటి?
question_punjabi: IPL ਵਿੱਚ RR ਦੇ ਖਿਲਾਫ Nehal Wadhera ਦੇ ਸਾਰੇ ਸਕੋਰਾਂ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਦਿਓ।

question: list instances of csk chasing down a target of 180+.List the teams, target and the year
query:
WITH FirstInningScores AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS first_inning_total
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "inning" = 1
  GROUP BY
    "match_id"
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN T1."team1" = 'Chennai Super Kings' THEN CASE
      WHEN T1."team2" IN ('Deccan Chargers', 'Sunrisers Hyderabad') THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'
      WHEN T1."team2" IN ('Delhi Daredevils', 'Delhi Capitals') THEN 'Delhi Capitals'
      WHEN T1."team2" IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings') THEN 'Punjab Kings'
      WHEN T1."team2" IN ('Pune Warriors', 'Rising Pune Supergiant', 'Rising Pune Supergiants') THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant'
      WHEN T1."team2" IN ('Royal Challengers Bangalore', 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru') THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
      ELSE T1."team2"
    END
    ELSE CASE
      WHEN T1."team1" IN ('Deccan Chargers', 'Sunrisers Hyderabad') THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'
      WHEN T1."team1" IN ('Delhi Daredevils', 'Delhi Capitals') THEN 'Delhi Capitals'
      WHEN T1."team1" IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings') THEN 'Punjab Kings'
      WHEN T1."team1" IN ('Pune Warriors', 'Rising Pune Supergiant', 'Rising Pune Supergiants') THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant'
      WHEN T1."team1" IN ('Royal Challengers Bangalore', 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru') THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
      ELSE T1."team1"
    END
  END AS opponent_team,
  T2.first_inning_total + 1 AS target,
  T1."season"
FROM "Matches" AS T1
INNER JOIN FirstInningScores AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
WHERE
  T1."match_winner" = 'Chennai Super Kings' AND T1."result_type" = 'wickets' AND T2.first_inning_total >= 179;
question_english: list instances of csk chasing down a target of 180+.List the teams, target and the year
question_hindi_1: *CSK द्वारा 180+ के लक्ष्य का सफलतापूर्वक पीछा किए गए मैचों की सूची बनाएं। इसमें टीम, लक्ष्य और साल का उल्लेख करें।**
question_hindi_2: CSK ने कब-कब 180+ का लक्ष्य सफलतापूर्वक हासिल किया है? टीम, लक्ष्य और साल के साथ सूची दें।
question_hindi_3: उन मैचों की सूची दें जिनमें CSK ने 180 से ज़्यादा का लक्ष्य हासिल किया हो। टीम, लक्ष्य और साल भी बताएं।
question_telugu_1: CSK ఎప్పుడు 180+ పరుగుల లక్ష్యం సాధించారు? టీం, లక్ష్యం మరియు సంవత్సరం రాయండి.
question_punjabi: CSK ਦੁਆਰਾ 180+ ਦੇ target ਦਾ ਪਿੱਛਾ ਕਰਨ ਦੇ ਮੌਕਿਆਂ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਦਿਓ; ਟੀਮਾਂ, target ਅਤੇ ਸਾਲ ਦੀ ਜਾਣਕਾਰੀ ਵੀ ਦਿਓ।

question: give the 3 highest targets chased down after losing first 5 wickets for 75 or lower.list the teams, target and the year.
query:
WITH WicketFallInfo AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "batting_team",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS cumulative_score,
    SUM(CASE WHEN "wicket_type" IS NOT NULL AND "wicket_type" <> 'retired hurt' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS wicket_count
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "inning" = 2
), FifthWicketScores AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "batting_team",
    MIN(cumulative_score) AS score_at_5th_wicket
  FROM WicketFallInfo
  WHERE
    wicket_count = 5
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "batting_team"
), Targets AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") + 1 AS target
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "inning" = 1
  GROUP BY
    "match_id"
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN T3."match_winner" IN ('Delhi Daredevils', 'Delhi Capitals') THEN 'Delhi Capitals'
    WHEN T3."match_winner" IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings') THEN 'Punjab Kings'
    WHEN T3."match_winner" IN ('Deccan Chargers', 'Sunrisers Hyderabad') THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'
    WHEN T3."match_winner" IN ('Pune Warriors', 'Rising Pune Supergiant', 'Rising Pune Supergiants') THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant'
    WHEN T3."match_winner" IN ('Royal Challengers Bangalore', 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru') THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
    ELSE T3."match_winner"
  END AS "winning_team",
  T2.target,
  T3."season"
FROM FifthWicketScores AS T1
JOIN Targets AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
JOIN Matches AS T3
  ON T1."match_id" = T3."match_id"
WHERE
  T1.score_at_5th_wicket <= 75 AND T1."batting_team" = T3."match_winner"
ORDER BY
  T2.target DESC
LIMIT 3;
question_english: give the 3 highest targets chased down after losing first 5 wickets for 75 or lower.list the teams, target and the year.
question_hindi_1: 75 रन या उससे कम के स्कोर पर पहले 5 विकेट गंवाने के बाद, सफलतापूर्वक हासिल किए गए 3 सबसे बड़े लक्ष्यों की सूची दें। टीमों, लक्ष्य (target) और वर्ष का भी उल्लेख करें।
question_telugu_1: 75 పరుగులు లేకపోతే దానికన్నా తక్కువ స్కోర్ ఉన్నప్పుడు మొదటి 5 వికెట్లు పోయిన తర్వాత విజయవంతంగా చేరిన 3 అన్నిటికన్నా పెద్ద లక్ష్యాలుని రాయండి. టీం, లక్ష్యం మరియు సంవత్సరం రాయండి.
question_punjabi: ਪਹਿਲੀਆਂ 5 ਵਿਕਟਾਂ 75 ਜਾਂ ਇਸ ਤੋਂ ਘੱਟ ਰੰਨਾਂ 'ਤੇ ਗੁਆਉਣ ਤੋਂ ਬਾਅਦ ਪਿੱਛਾ ਕੀਤੇ ਗਏ 3 ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਡੇ targets ਦੀ ਜਾਣਕਾਰੀ ਦਿਓ; ਟੀਮਾਂ, target ਅਤੇ ਸਾਲ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਦਿਓ।

question: list the 3 highest runs given by a kkr bowler in an over.list the bowler, runs given, the opponent and the year.
query: SELECT T2."player_name", SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."wides" + T1."noballs") AS "runs_conceded", T1."batting_team", T3."season" FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1."bowler_id" = T2."player_id" INNER JOIN Matches AS T3 ON T1."match_id" = T3."match_id" WHERE T1."bowling_team" = 'Kolkata Knight Riders' GROUP BY T1."match_id", T1."inning", T1."over_number", T1."bowler_id" ORDER BY "runs_conceded" DESC LIMIT 3
question_english: list the 3 highest runs given by a kkr bowler in an over.list the bowler, runs given, the opponent and the year.
question_hindi_1: KKR के किसी गेंदबाज़ द्वारा एक ओवर में दिए गए 3 सबसे ज़्यादा रनों की सूची दें। गेंदबाज़ का नाम, दिए गए रन, विपक्षी टीम और साल भी बताएं।
question_telugu_1: ఒక ఓవర్లో KKR యొక్క బౌలర్ ఇచ్చిన 3 అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ పరుగులు ఏమిటి? బౌలర్, ఇచ్చిన పరుగులు, వ్యతిరేకమైన టీం మరియు సంవత్సరం రాయండి.
question_punjabi: KKR ਦੇ ਕਿਸੇ ਗੇਂਦਬਾਜ਼ ਦੁਆਰਾ ਇੱਕ ਓਵਰ ਵਿੱਚ ਦਿੱਤੀਆਂ ਗਈਆਂ 3 ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਰਨ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਦਿਓ; ਗੇਂਦਬਾਜ਼, ਰਨ, ਵਿਰੋਧੀ ਟੀਮ ਅਤੇ ਸਾਲ ਦੀ ਜਾਣਕਾਰੀ ਦਿਓ ।

question: Of the matches that were played for 20 overs, list the two highest powerplay score by a team losing five or more wickets in Powerplay in IPL.list the teams, runs in pp, the opponent and the year.
query:
SELECT
  T1."batting_team",
  T1."powerplay_runs",
  CASE
    WHEN T1."batting_team" = T2."team1"
    THEN T2."team2"
    ELSE T2."team1"
  END AS "opponent",
  T2."season"
FROM (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "batting_team",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS "powerplay_runs"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "over_number" <= 5
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "batting_team"
  HAVING
    COUNT("player_out_id") >= 5
) AS T1
JOIN "Matches" AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
WHERE
  T1."match_id" IN (
    SELECT
      "match_id"
    FROM "Deliveries"
    GROUP BY
      "match_id"
    HAVING
      MAX("over_number") >= 19
  )
ORDER BY
  T1."powerplay_runs" DESC
LIMIT 2;
question_english: Of the matches that were played for 20 overs, list the two highest powerplay score by a team losing five or more wickets in Powerplay in IPL.list the teams, runs in pp, the opponent and the year.
question_hindi_1: IPL में, 20 ओवर के मैचों में पावरप्ले के दौरान पाँच या उससे ज़्यादा विकेट गंवाने वाली टीमों के दो सर्वोच्च स्कोर कौन से हैं? टीम, पावरप्ले में बनाए गए रन, विपक्षी टीम और साल भी बताएं।
question_telugu_1: IPL లో 20 ఓవర్ల మ్యాచులలో పవర్ప్లే జరుగుతున్నప్పుడు 5 లేకపోతే దానికన్నా ఎక్కువ వికెట్లు పోగొట్టుకున్న టీముల 2 అన్నిటికన్నా పెద్ద స్కోర్లు ఏమిటి? టీం, పవర్ప్లేలో సంపాదించిన పరుగులు, వ్యతిరేకమైన టీం మరియు సంవత్సరం రాయండి.

question: Highest SR in debut IPL innings (10+ balls)
query:
WITH DebutInnings AS (
  SELECT
    "player_id",
    MIN("match_id") AS debut_match_id
  FROM PlayerInMatch
  GROUP BY
    "player_id"
)
SELECT
  T3."player_name",
  SUM(T2."runs_scored") * 100.0 / COUNT(CASE WHEN T2."wides" = 0 THEN 1 END) AS strike_rate
FROM DebutInnings AS T1
JOIN Deliveries AS T2
  ON T1."player_id" = T2."striker_id" AND T1."debut_match_id" = T2."match_id"
JOIN Players AS T3
  ON T1."player_id" = T3."player_id"
GROUP BY
  T1."player_id"
HAVING
  COUNT(CASE WHEN T2."wides" = 0 THEN 1 END) >= 10
ORDER BY
  strike_rate DESC
LIMIT 1;
question_english: Highest SR in debut IPL innings (10+ balls)
question_hindi_1: *आईपीएल की डेब्यू पारी में सबसे ज़्यादा स्ट्राइक रेट (10+ गेंदें)**
question_telugu_1: IPL యొక్క డెబ్యూ ఇన్నింగ్స్లో అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ స్ట్రైక్ రేట్ (10+ బంతులు) ఏమిటి?
question_punjabi: ਆਪਣੀ ਪਹਿਲੀ IPL ਪਾਰੀ ਵਿੱਚ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਸਟ੍ਰਾਈਕ ਰੇਟ (ਘੱਟੋ-ਘੱਟ 10 ਗੇਂਦਾਂ) ਵਾਲਾ ਖਿਡਾਰੀ ਕੌਣ ਹੈ ।

question: 5 Highest SR for a player the first time they feature in the playing eleven.minimum 10 balls.list the player, teams, player score and the balls, and the year.
query:
WITH DebutMatches AS (
  SELECT
    T1."player_id",
    T1."match_id",
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY T1."player_id" ORDER BY T2."match_date") AS rn
  FROM "PlayerInMatch" AS T1
  JOIN "Matches" AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
), BattingStats AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "striker_id",
    SUM("runs_scored") AS player_score,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "wides" = 0 THEN 1 END) AS balls_faced,
    SUM("runs_scored") * 100.0 / COUNT(CASE WHEN "wides" = 0 THEN 1 END) AS strike_rate
  FROM "Deliveries"
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "striker_id"
)
SELECT
  T4."player_name",
  T3."team1" || ' vs ' || T3."team2" AS teams,
  T2.player_score,
  T2.balls_faced,
  T3."season"
FROM DebutMatches AS T1
JOIN BattingStats AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" AND T1."player_id" = T2."striker_id"
JOIN "Matches" AS T3
  ON T1."match_id" = T3."match_id"
JOIN "Players" AS T4
  ON T1."player_id" = T4."player_id"
WHERE
  T1.rn = 1 AND T2.balls_faced >= 10
ORDER BY
  T2.strike_rate DESC
LIMIT 5;

question_english: 5 Highest SR for a player the first time they feature in the playing eleven.minimum 10 balls.list the player, teams, player score and the balls, and the year.
question_hindi_1: प्लेइंग इलेवन में अपने डेब्यू मैच में सबसे ज़्यादा स्ट्राइक रेट वाले 5 खिलाड़ी। (कम से कम 10 गेंदें) खिलाड़ी का नाम, टीमें, स्कोर, गेंदें और साल बताएं।
question_telugu_1: ప్లేయింగ్ 11 లో అతన డెబ్యూ మ్యాచ్లో అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ స్ట్రైక్ రేట్ ఉన్న 5 క్రీడాకార్లు ఎవరు (కనీసం 10 బంతులు)? క్రీడాకార్ల పేరు, టీం, స్కోర్, బంతులు మరియు సంవత్సరం రాయండి.

question: list all instances of a team losing both its openers for nought.list the teams, openers and the year
query:
SELECT
  T3."season",
  T1."batting_team",
  T4."player_name",
  T5."player_name"
FROM (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "batting_team",
    "striker_id" AS opener1,
    "non_striker_id" AS opener2
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "over_number" = 0 AND "ball_number" = 1
) AS T1
INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T3
  ON T1."match_id" = T3."match_id"
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T4
  ON T1.opener1 = T4."player_id"
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T5
  ON T1.opener2 = T5."player_id"
WHERE
  (
    SELECT
      SUM("runs_scored")
    FROM "Deliveries"
    WHERE
      "match_id" = T1."match_id" AND "striker_id" = T1.opener1
  ) = 0
  AND (
    SELECT
      SUM("runs_scored")
    FROM "Deliveries"
    WHERE
      "match_id" = T1."match_id" AND "striker_id" = T1.opener2
  ) = 0
  AND T1.opener1 IN (
    SELECT
      "player_out_id"
    FROM "Deliveries"
    WHERE
      "match_id" = T1."match_id"
  )
  AND T1.opener2 IN (
    SELECT
      "player_out_id"
    FROM "Deliveries"
    WHERE
      "match_id" = T1."match_id"
  );
question_english: list all instances of a team losing both its openers for nought.list the teams, openers and the year

question: list the 5 highest strike rates of a player with minimum 10 balls played in their debut ipl match.give the player, their runs and balls in that match, teams in that match, and year
query:
WITH DebutMatches AS (
  SELECT
    "player_id",
    MIN("match_id") AS debut_match_id
  FROM PlayerInMatch
  GROUP BY
    "player_id"
)
SELECT
  T2."player_name",
  SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS "runs",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN T1."wides" = 0 THEN 1 END) AS "balls_faced",
  SUM(T1."runs_scored") * 100.0 / COUNT(CASE WHEN T1."wides" = 0 THEN 1 END) AS "strike_rate",
  T3."team1",
  T3."team2",
  T3."season"
FROM Deliveries AS T1
INNER JOIN DebutMatches AS DM
  ON T1."striker_id" = DM."player_id" AND T1."match_id" = DM.debut_match_id
INNER JOIN Players AS T2
  ON T1."striker_id" = T2."player_id"
INNER JOIN Matches AS T3
  ON T1."match_id" = T3."match_id"
GROUP BY
  T2."player_name",
  T3."team1",
  T3."team2",
  T3."season"
HAVING
  COUNT(CASE WHEN T1."wides" = 0 THEN 1 END) >= 10
ORDER BY
  "strike_rate" DESC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: list the 5 highest strike rates of a player with minimum 10 balls played in their debut ipl match.give the player, their runs and balls in that match, teams in that match, and year

question: list the 5 highest strike rates of a player with minimum 10 balls played in their debut ipl inning(the first time they batted in ipl).give the player, their runs and balls in that match, teams in that match, and year.
query:
WITH DebutInning AS (
  SELECT
    "striker_id",
    MIN("match_date") AS debut_date
  FROM "Deliveries"
  JOIN "Matches"
    ON "Deliveries"."match_id" = "Matches"."match_id"
  GROUP BY
    "striker_id"
)
SELECT
  T4."player_name",
  SUM(T2."runs_scored") AS runs,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN T2."wides" = 0 THEN 1 END) AS balls_faced,
  T3."team1",
  T3."team2",
  T3."season"
FROM DebutInning AS T1
JOIN "Deliveries" AS T2
  ON T1."striker_id" = T2."striker_id"
JOIN "Matches" AS T3
  ON T2."match_id" = T3."match_id"
  AND T1.debut_date = T3."match_date"
JOIN "Players" AS T4
  ON T1."striker_id" = T4."player_id"
GROUP BY
  T1."striker_id",
  T2."match_id"
HAVING
  COUNT(CASE WHEN T2."wides" = 0 THEN 1 END) >= 10
ORDER BY
  SUM(T2."runs_scored") * 100.0 / COUNT(CASE WHEN T2."wides" = 0 THEN 1 END) DESC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: list the 5 highest strike rates of a player with minimum 10 balls played in their debut ipl inning(the first time they batted in ipl).give the player, their runs and balls in that match, teams in that match, and year.

question: give the players who did not hit a boundary in the first 20 balls of their innings in ipl 2025.give the player name and their score in that match
query:
WITH RankedBalls AS (
  SELECT
    T1."match_id",
    T1."striker_id",
    T1."runs_scored",
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY T1."match_id", T1."striker_id" ORDER BY T1."inning", T1."over_number", T1."ball_number") AS ball_faced_num
  FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
  INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
  WHERE
    T2."season" = '2025' AND T1."wides" = 0
), NoBoundaryInnings AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "striker_id"
  FROM RankedBalls
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "striker_id"
  HAVING
    MAX(ball_faced_num) >= 20
    AND SUM(CASE WHEN ball_faced_num <= 20 AND "runs_scored" IN (4, 6) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 0
)
SELECT
  T4."player_name",
  SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS score_in_match
FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
INNER JOIN NoBoundaryInnings AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" AND T1."striker_id" = T2."striker_id"
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T4
  ON T1."striker_id" = T4."player_id"
GROUP BY
  T4."player_name",
  T1."match_id"
question_english: give the players who did not hit a boundary in the first 20 balls of their innings in ipl 2025.give the player name and their score in that match

question: which bowlers have taken the most wickets playing for csk?give the top 5 with their wickets for csk
query: SELECT T2.player_name, COUNT(T1.delivery_id) AS wickets FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1.bowler_id = T2.player_id WHERE T1.bowling_team = 'Chennai Super Kings' AND T1.wicket_type IS NOT NULL AND T1.wicket_type NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field', 'retired out') GROUP BY T2.player_name ORDER BY wickets DESC LIMIT 5

question: 4 Highest SR vs a bowler in IPL (50+ balls)give runs and balls too
query: SELECT T2."player_name", T3."player_name", SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS "runs", COUNT(CASE WHEN T1."wides" = 0 THEN 1 END) AS "balls", CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(CASE WHEN T1."wides" = 0 THEN 1 END) AS "strike_rate" FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1."striker_id" = T2."player_id" INNER JOIN Players AS T3 ON T1."bowler_id" = T3."player_id" GROUP BY T2."player_name", T3."player_name" HAVING COUNT(CASE WHEN T1."wides" = 0 THEN 1 END) >= 50 ORDER BY "strike_rate" DESC LIMIT 4
question_english: 4 Highest SR vs a bowler in IPL (50+ balls)give runs and balls too
question_hindi_1: *IPL में किसी गेंदबाज़ के खिलाफ़ 4 सबसे ज़्यादा SR (न्यूनतम 50 गेंदें), रन और गेंदों के साथ बताएं।**
question_hindi_2: *IPL में किसी एक गेंदबाज़ के खिलाफ़ उच्चतम स्ट्राइक रेट (SR) वाले 4 बल्लेबाज़ कौन हैं (न्यूनतम 50 गेंदें)? उनके रन और खेली गई गेंदें भी बताएं।**
question_telugu_1: IPL లో బౌలర్లల వ్యతిరేకంగా 4 అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ స్ట్రైక్ రేటులు ఏమిటి (కనీసం 50 బంతులు)? వాళ్ళ పరుగులు మరియు బంతులు రాయండి.
question_punjabi: IPL ਵਿੱਚ ਕਿਸੇ ਗੇਂਦਬਾਜ਼ ਦੇ ਖਿਲਾਫ 4 ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਸਟ੍ਰਾਈਕ ਰੇਟ (ਘੱਟੋ-ਘੱਟ 50 ਗੇਂਦਾਂ); ਰੰਨਾਂ ਅਤੇ ਗੇਂਦਾਂ ਦਾ ਵੇਰਵਾ ਵੀ ਦਿਓ।

question: list all instances of most balls bowled in an over.give balls, bowler, team in the match and the year
query:
WITH OverCounts AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "bowler_id",
    "bowling_team",
    COUNT(*) AS balls_in_over
  FROM "Deliveries"
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "over_number"
)
SELECT
  T1.balls_in_over,
  T3."player_name",
  T1."bowling_team",
  T2."season"
FROM OverCounts AS T1
JOIN "Matches" AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
JOIN "Players" AS T3
  ON T1."bowler_id" = T3."player_id"
WHERE
  T1.balls_in_over = (
    SELECT
      MAX(balls_in_over)
    FROM OverCounts
  );
question_english: list all instances of most balls bowled in an over.give balls, bowler, team in the match and the year
question_hindi_1: एक ओवर में सबसे ज़्यादा गेंदें फेंकने के सभी मौकों की सूची दें। हर मामले में गेंदों की संख्या, गेंदबाज़, मैच में टीम और साल बताएँ।
question_telugu_1: ఒక ఓవర్లో అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ బంతులు విసిరిన అన్నీ ఉదాహరణాలు ఇవ్వండి. ప్రతి ఉదాహరణానికి బంతులు, బౌలర్, మ్యాచ్లో ఉన్న టీం మరియు సంవత్సరం రాయండి.
question_punjabi: ਇੱਕ ਓਵਰ ਵਿੱਚ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਗੇਂਦਾਂ ਸੁੱਟੇ ਜਾਣ ਦੇ ਸਾਰੇ ਮੌਕਿਆਂ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਦਿਓ। ਗੇਂਦਾਂ, ਗੇਂਦਬਾਜ਼, ਮੈਚ ਵਿੱਚ ਸ਼ਾਮਲ ਟੀਮ ਅਤੇ ਸਾਲ ਦੀ ਜਾਣਕਾਰੀ ਦਿਓ ।

question: give the lowest powerplay scores of ipl 2025.give the teams involved in the match, powerplay score with wickets and the city.(consider the matches that were played complete)
query:
SELECT
  T1."team1",
  T1."team2",
  T2."batting_team",
  T2.pp_runs || '/' || T2.pp_wickets AS powerplay_score,
  T1."city"
FROM Matches AS T1
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "batting_team",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS pp_runs,
    COUNT("player_out_id") AS pp_wickets
  FROM Deliveries
  WHERE
    "over_number" <= 5
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "batting_team"
) AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
WHERE
  T1."season" = '2025' AND T1."result_type" IN ('runs', 'wickets')
ORDER BY
  pp_runs ASC,
  pp_wickets DESC
LIMIT 5;
answer: ('Royal Challengers Bengaluru', 'Chennai Super Kings', 'Chennai Super Kings', '30/3', 'Chennai')
('Chennai Super Kings', 'Kolkata Knight Riders', 'Chennai Super Kings', '31/2', 'Chennai')

question: list punjab's win in dharamsala since 2012
query:
SELECT
  "match_date",
  (
    CASE
      WHEN "team1" IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings') THEN 'Punjab Kings'
      ELSE "team1"
    END
  ) AS team1_name,
  (
    CASE
      WHEN "team2" IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings') THEN 'Punjab Kings'
      ELSE "team2"
    END
  ) AS team2_name,
  "result_type",
  "result_margin"
FROM "Matches"
WHERE
  "city" = 'Dharamsala' AND CAST(strftime('%Y', "match_date") AS INTEGER) >= 2012 AND (
    CASE
      WHEN "match_winner" IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings') THEN 'Punjab Kings'
      ELSE "match_winner"
    END
  ) = 'Punjab Kings'
ORDER BY
  "match_date";
question_english: list punjab's win in dharamsala since 2012
question_hindi_1: 2012 से धर्मशाला में पंजाब की जीतें बताएं।
question_telugu_1: 2012 నుంచి ధరంశాలలో పంజాబ్ యొక్క గెలుపులు ఏమిటి?
question_punjabi: 2012 ਤੋਂ ਬਾਅਦ ਧਰਮਸ਼ਾਲਾ ਵਿੱਚ ਪੰਜਾਬ ਦੀਆਂ ਜਿੱਤਾਂ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਦਿਓ।

question: list 50-plus scores from No.5 or lower for LSG
query:
WITH PlayerAppearances AS (
  SELECT
    "delivery_id",
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "striker_id" AS "player_id"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  UNION
  SELECT
    "delivery_id",
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "non_striker_id" AS "player_id"
  FROM "Deliveries"
), FirstAppearance AS (
  SELECT
    "player_id",
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    MIN("delivery_id") AS first_delivery
  FROM PlayerAppearances
  GROUP BY
    "player_id",
    "match_id",
    "inning"
), BattingPositions AS (
  SELECT
    "player_id",
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning" ORDER BY first_delivery) AS position
  FROM FirstAppearance
), PlayerRuns AS (
  SELECT
    "striker_id",
    "match_id",
    "batting_team",
    SUM("runs_scored") AS total_runs
  FROM "Deliveries"
  GROUP BY
    "striker_id",
    "match_id",
    "batting_team"
)
SELECT
  T4."player_name",
  T3."total_runs",
  T5."venue",
  T5."match_date"
FROM BattingPositions AS T1
JOIN PlayerRuns AS T3
  ON T1."player_id" = T3."striker_id" AND T1."match_id" = T3."match_id"
JOIN "Players" AS T4
  ON T1."player_id" = T4."player_id"
JOIN "Matches" AS T5
  ON T1."match_id" = T5."match_id"
WHERE
  T3."batting_team" = 'Lucknow Super Giants' AND T1."position" >= 5 AND T3."total_runs" >= 50
ORDER BY
  T3."total_runs" DESC;

question: stoinis batting stats in last over of the inning.give runs, balls, dismissals, strike rate, fours and sixes
query: SELECT T2."player_name", SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS total_runs, COUNT(CASE WHEN T1."wides" = 0 THEN 1 END) AS balls_faced, COUNT(CASE WHEN T1."player_out_id" = T1."striker_id" THEN 1 END) AS dismissals, CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(CASE WHEN T1."wides" = 0 THEN 1 END) AS strike_rate, SUM(CASE WHEN T1."runs_scored" = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS fours, SUM(CASE WHEN T1."runs_scored" = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS sixes FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Players AS T2 ON T1."striker_id" = T2."player_id" WHERE T2."player_name" = 'MP Stoinis' AND T1."over_number" = 19

question: most 50+ consecutive scores by an opener across all editions.give the player, his streak, the scores in that streak and the teams and the year.list all the instances of highest streak
query:
WITH OpenerInnings AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "striker_id" AS "player_id"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "over_number" = 0
  UNION
  SELECT DISTINCT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "non_striker_id" AS "player_id"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "over_number" = 0
), OpenerScores AS (
  SELECT
    T1."player_id",
    T2."match_id",
    T3."match_date",
    T3."season",
    T2."batting_team",
    SUM(T2."runs_scored") AS "runs"
  FROM OpenerInnings AS T1
  INNER JOIN "Deliveries" AS T2
    ON T1."player_id" = T2."striker_id"
    AND T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
    AND T1."inning" = T2."inning"
  INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T3
    ON T1."match_id" = T3."match_id"
  GROUP BY
    T1."player_id",
    T2."match_id"
), RankedScores AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY "player_id" ORDER BY "match_date") AS inning_rank
  FROM OpenerScores
), StreakIdentifier AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    inning_rank - ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY "player_id" ORDER BY "match_date") AS streak_group
  FROM RankedScores
  WHERE
    "runs" >= 50
), StreakDetails AS (
  SELECT
    "player_id",
    COUNT(*) AS "streak_count",
    GROUP_CONCAT("runs", ', ') AS "scores",
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT "batting_team") AS "teams",
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT SUBSTR("season", 1, 4)) AS "years"
  FROM StreakIdentifier
  GROUP BY
    "player_id",
    "streak_group"
), MaxStreak AS (
  SELECT
    MAX("streak_count") AS max_streak
  FROM StreakDetails
)
SELECT
  T4."player_name",
  T1."streak_count",
  T1."scores",
  T1."teams",
  T1."years"
FROM StreakDetails AS T1
INNER JOIN MaxStreak AS T2
  ON T1."streak_count" = T2.max_streak
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T4
  ON T1."player_id" = T4."player_id"
ORDER BY
  T4."player_name";
question_english: most 50+ consecutive scores by an opener across all editions.give the player, his streak, the scores in that streak and the teams and the year.list all the instances of highest streak

question: the 2 highest partnerships for the sixth wicket or lower for RR in the IPL. list the partnership runs and the batters involved
query:
WITH WicketInfo AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "striker_id",
    "non_striker_id",
    "runs_scored",
    "extra_runs",
    COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN "player_out_id" IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (
      PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning"
      ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number"
      ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING
    ), 0) AS "partnership_group"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE "batting_team" = 'Rajasthan Royals'
),
PartnershipRuns AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "partnership_group",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS "partnership_runs"
  FROM WicketInfo
  WHERE "partnership_group" >= 5
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "partnership_group"
),
PartnershipPlayers AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "partnership_group",
    "player_id"
  FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT "match_id", "inning", "partnership_group", "striker_id" AS "player_id" FROM WicketInfo
    UNION
    SELECT DISTINCT "match_id", "inning", "partnership_group", "non_striker_id" AS "player_id" FROM WicketInfo
  )
  WHERE "partnership_group" >= 5
),
PartnershipBatters AS (
  SELECT
    T1."match_id",
    T1."inning",
    T1."partnership_group",
    GROUP_CONCAT(T2."player_name", ', ') AS "batters"
  FROM PartnershipPlayers AS T1
  JOIN "Players" AS T2 ON T1."player_id" = T2."player_id"
  GROUP BY
    T1."match_id",
    T1."inning",
    T1."partnership_group"
)
SELECT
  T1."partnership_runs",
  T2."batters"
FROM PartnershipRuns AS T1
JOIN PartnershipBatters AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
  AND T1."inning" = T2."inning"
  AND T1."partnership_group" = T2."partnership_group"
ORDER BY
  T1."partnership_runs" DESC
LIMIT 2;
question_english: the 2 highest partnerships for the sixth wicket or lower for RR in the IPL. list the partnership runs and the batters involved

question: Highest partnerships for CSK vs RCB (any wicket)
query:
WITH MatchIDs AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id"
  FROM "Matches"
  WHERE
    (
      CASE "team1"
        WHEN 'Royal Challengers Bangalore' THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
        ELSE "team1"
      END = 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru' AND "team2" = 'Chennai Super Kings'
    ) OR (
      "team1" = 'Chennai Super Kings' AND CASE "team2"
        WHEN 'Royal Challengers Bangalore' THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
        ELSE "team2"
      END = 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
    )
), PartnershipPeriods AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "over_number",
    "ball_number",
    "striker_id",
    "non_striker_id",
    "runs_scored",
    "extra_runs",
    SUM(CASE WHEN "player_out_id" IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS "partnership_group"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "match_id" IN (
      SELECT
        "match_id"
      FROM MatchIDs
    )
), PartnershipDetails AS (
  SELECT
    "partnership_group",
    "match_id",
    CASE WHEN "striker_id" < "non_striker_id" THEN "striker_id" ELSE "non_striker_id" END AS "p1_id",
    CASE WHEN "striker_id" < "non_striker_id" THEN "non_striker_id" ELSE "striker_id" END AS "p2_id",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS "runs"
  FROM PartnershipPeriods
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "partnership_group",
    "p1_id",
    "p2_id"
)
SELECT
  T3."player_name",
  T4."player_name",
  T2."runs"
FROM PartnershipDetails AS T2
JOIN "Players" AS T3
  ON T2."p1_id" = T3."player_id"
JOIN "Players" AS T4
  ON T2."p2_id" = T4."player_id"
ORDER BY
  T2."runs" DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: 4 Fastest fifty in IPL history (by balls faced). give the player team and the year
query: WITH PlayerInnings AS (SELECT "match_id", "striker_id", "batting_team", SUM("runs_scored") OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "striker_id" ORDER BY "inning", "over_number", "ball_number") AS "cumulative_runs", SUM(CASE WHEN "wides" = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "striker_id" ORDER BY "inning", "over_number", "ball_number") AS "balls_faced" FROM "Deliveries"), FiftyData AS (SELECT "match_id", "striker_id", "batting_team", MIN("balls_faced") AS "balls_to_reach_50" FROM PlayerInnings WHERE "cumulative_runs" >= 50 GROUP BY "match_id", "striker_id") SELECT T3."player_name", T2."batting_team", T4."season", T2."balls_to_reach_50" FROM FiftyData AS T2 INNER JOIN "Players" AS T3 ON T2."striker_id" = T3."player_id" INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T4 ON T2."match_id" = T4."match_id" ORDER BY T2."balls_to_reach_50" ASC LIMIT 4

question: all instances for the Most consecutive 50-plus scores for RCB in the IPL
query:
WITH PlayerMatchScores AS (
  SELECT
    T1.striker_id,
    T2.match_date,
    SUM(T1.runs_scored) AS runs
  FROM Deliveries AS T1
  INNER JOIN Matches AS T2
    ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id
  WHERE
    (CASE
      WHEN T1.batting_team IN ('Royal Challengers Bangalore', 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru') THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
      ELSE T1.batting_team
    END) = 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
  GROUP BY
    T1.striker_id,
    T2.match_date
), FiftyPlusFlag AS (
  SELECT
    striker_id,
    match_date,
    (
      CASE
        WHEN runs >= 50
        THEN 1
        ELSE 0
      END
    ) AS is_fifty_plus,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY striker_id ORDER BY match_date) AS match_num
  FROM PlayerMatchScores
), StreakGroup AS (
  SELECT
    striker_id,
    (
      match_num - ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY striker_id ORDER BY match_date)
    ) AS streak_id
  FROM FiftyPlusFlag
  WHERE
    is_fifty_plus = 1
)
SELECT
  T2.player_name,
  COUNT(T1.striker_id) AS consecutive_fifties
FROM StreakGroup AS T1
INNER JOIN Players AS T2
  ON T1.striker_id = T2.player_id
GROUP BY
  T2.player_name,
  T1.streak_id
ORDER BY
  consecutive_fifties DESC
LIMIT 1;
question_english: all instances for the Most consecutive 50-plus scores for RCB in the IPL
question_hindi_1: IPL में RCB के लिए सबसे ज़्यादा लगातार 50-प्लस स्कोर के सभी उदाहरण।

question_punjabi: IPL ਵਿੱਚ RCB ਲਈ ਲਗਾਤਾਰ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ 50+ ਸਕੋਰ ਬਣਾਉਣ ਦੇ ਸਾਰੇ ਮੌਕਿਆਂ ਦਾ ਵੇਰਵਾ।

question: Least dot balls played by a team in an IPL innings that played full 20 overs
query:
SELECT
  "batting_team",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN "runs_scored" = 0 AND "wides" = 0 THEN 1 END) AS dot_balls
FROM "Deliveries"
GROUP BY
  "match_id",
  "batting_team"
HAVING
  MAX("over_number") = 19
ORDER BY
  dot_balls
LIMIT 1;

question: Least dot balls played by a team in an IPL innings that played full 20 overs.list the least 6 instances
query:
SELECT
  T1.batting_team,
  T2.season,
  SUM(CASE WHEN T1.runs_scored = 0 AND T1.wides = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dot_balls
FROM Deliveries AS T1
INNER JOIN Matches AS T2
  ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id
GROUP BY
  T1.match_id,
  T1.inning
HAVING
  MAX(T1.over_number) = 19
ORDER BY
  dot_balls ASC
LIMIT 6;

question: 4 fasteest to reach 4000 runs in terms of balls played
query:
WITH CumulativeData AS (
  SELECT
    T1."striker_id",
    SUM(T1."runs_scored") OVER (PARTITION BY T1."striker_id" ORDER BY T2."match_date", T1."delivery_id") AS "cumulative_runs",
    SUM(CASE WHEN T1."wides" = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY T1."striker_id" ORDER BY T2."match_date", T1."delivery_id") AS "cumulative_balls"
  FROM Deliveries AS T1
  INNER JOIN Matches AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
), MilestoneReached AS (
  SELECT
    "striker_id",
    MIN("cumulative_balls") AS "balls_to_4000"
  FROM CumulativeData
  WHERE
    "cumulative_runs" >= 4000
  GROUP BY
    "striker_id"
)
SELECT
  T3."player_name",
  T4."balls_to_4000"
FROM MilestoneReached AS T4
INNER JOIN Players AS T3
  ON T4."striker_id" = T3."player_id"
ORDER BY
  T4."balls_to_4000"
LIMIT 4;
question_english: 4 fasteest to reach 4000 runs in terms of balls played

question: list all instances of 4 or more batters scoring 40+ runs in an inning.give the teams in the match and the year
query:
WITH BatterScores AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",

  FROM "Deliveries"
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "striker_id"
  HAVING
    SUM("runs_scored") >= 40
), InningsWith40Plus AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning"
  FROM BatterScores
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "inning"
  HAVING
    COUNT("striker_id") >= 4
)
SELECT
  T2."season",
  CASE
    WHEN T2."team1" IN ('Delhi Daredevils', 'Delhi Capitals')
    THEN 'Delhi Capitals'
    WHEN T2."team1" IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings')
    THEN 'Punjab Kings'
    WHEN T2."team1" IN ('Deccan Chargers', 'Sunrisers Hyderabad')
    THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'
    WHEN T2."team1" IN ('Pune Warriors', 'Rising Pune Supergiant', 'Rising Pune Supergiants')
    THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant'
    WHEN T2."team1" IN ('Royal Challengers Bangalore', 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru')
    THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
    ELSE T2."team1"
  END,
  CASE
    WHEN T2."team2" IN ('Delhi Daredevils', 'Delhi Capitals')
    THEN 'Delhi Capitals'
    WHEN T2."team2" IN ('Kings XI Punjab', 'Punjab Kings')
    THEN 'Punjab Kings'
    WHEN T2."team2" IN ('Deccan Chargers', 'Sunrisers Hyderabad')
    THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'
    WHEN T2."team2" IN ('Pune Warriors', 'Rising Pune Supergiant', 'Rising Pune Supergiants')
    THEN 'Rising Pune Supergiant'
    WHEN T2."team2" IN ('Royal Challengers Bangalore', 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru')
    THEN 'Royal Challengers Bengaluru'
    ELSE T2."team2"
  END
FROM InningsWith40Plus AS T1
INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id";
question_english: list all instances of 4 or more batters scoring 40+ runs in an inning.give the teams in the match and the year
question_hindi_1: उन सभी मैचों की सूची दें, जिनमें किसी एक पारी में 4 या ज़्यादा बल्लेबाज़ों ने 40+ रन बनाए हों। मैच की टीमों और साल का भी ज़िक्र करें।

question: 5 Most consecutive scores of 25 or more in IPL.give players and streak
query:
WITH PlayerMatchRuns AS (
  SELECT
    "striker_id" AS "player_id",
    "match_id",
    SUM("runs_scored") AS "runs"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  GROUP BY
    "striker_id",
    "match_id"
), ScoresWithDate AS (
  SELECT
    T1."player_id",
    T2."match_date",
    CASE
      WHEN T1."runs" >= 25 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END AS "is_25plus"
  FROM PlayerMatchRuns AS T1
  JOIN "Matches" AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
), StreakIdentifier AS (
  SELECT
    "player_id",
    "is_25plus",
    (
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY "player_id" ORDER BY "match_date") - ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY "player_id", "is_25plus" ORDER BY "match_date")
    ) AS "streak_group"
  FROM ScoresWithDate
), StreakLengths AS (
  SELECT
    "player_id",
    COUNT(*) AS "streak"
  FROM StreakIdentifier
  WHERE
    "is_25plus" = 1
  GROUP BY
    "player_id",
    "streak_group"
)
SELECT
  T2."player_name",
  T1."streak"
FROM StreakLengths AS T1
JOIN "Players" AS T2
  ON T1."player_id" = T2."player_id"
ORDER BY
  T1."streak" DESC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: 5 Most consecutive scores of 25 or more in IPL.give players and streak

question: 4 bowlers with Most 4-plus wicket hauls in the IPL
query:
WITH HaulCounts AS (
  SELECT
    "bowler_id",
    COUNT(*) AS num_hauls
  FROM (
    SELECT
      "bowler_id"
    FROM "Deliveries"
    WHERE
      "wicket_type" IS NOT NULL
      AND "wicket_type" NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field', 'retired out')
    GROUP BY
      "bowler_id",
      "match_id"
    HAVING
      COUNT(*) >= 4
  )
  GROUP BY
    "bowler_id"
), RankedHauls AS (
  SELECT
    "bowler_id",
    "num_hauls",
    DENSE_RANK() OVER (
      ORDER BY
        "num_hauls" DESC
    ) AS rnk
  FROM HaulCounts
)
SELECT
  T2."player_name",
  T1."num_hauls"
FROM RankedHauls AS T1
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T2
  ON T1."bowler_id" = T2."player_id"
WHERE
  T1.rnk <= 4
ORDER BY
  T1."num_hauls" DESC;
question_english: 4 bowlers with Most 4-plus wicket hauls in the IPL

question: 3 bowlers with Multiple hat-tricks in IPL
query:
WITH WicketDeliveries AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "bowler_id",
    "inning",
    "over_number",
    "ball_number",
    CASE
      WHEN "wicket_type" IS NOT NULL AND "wicket_type" NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field', 'retired out')
      THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END AS "is_wicket"
  FROM "Deliveries"
),
SequencedWickets AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "bowler_id",
    "is_wicket",
    LAG("is_wicket", 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "bowler_id" ORDER BY "inning", "over_number", "ball_number") AS "prev_is_wicket",
    LAG("is_wicket", 2, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "bowler_id" ORDER BY "inning", "over_number", "ball_number") AS "prev2_is_wicket"
  FROM WicketDeliveries
),
HatTricks AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    "match_id",
    "bowler_id"
  FROM SequencedWickets
  WHERE "is_wicket" = 1 AND "prev_is_wicket" = 1 AND "prev2_is_wicket" = 1
)
SELECT
  T2."player_name"
FROM HatTricks AS T1
JOIN "Players" AS T2
  ON T1."bowler_id" = T2."player_id"
GROUP BY
  T2."player_name"
HAVING
  COUNT(T1."match_id") > 1
ORDER BY
  COUNT(T1."match_id") DESC
LIMIT 3;
question_english: 3 bowlers with Multiple hat-tricks in IPL
question_hindi_1: IPL में एक से ज़्यादा हैट्रिक लेने वाले 3 गेंदबाज़

question: list all hat-tricks taken by a bowler against csk
query:
WITH BowlerDeliveries AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "bowler_id",
    "wicket_type",
    LAG("wicket_type", 1) OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning", "bowler_id" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS prev_wicket,
    LEAD("wicket_type", 1) OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning", "bowler_id" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS next_wicket
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "batting_team" = 'Chennai Super Kings'
)
SELECT
  T2."player_name"
FROM BowlerDeliveries AS T1
JOIN "Players" AS T2
  ON T1."bowler_id" = T2."player_id"
WHERE
  T1."wicket_type" IS NOT NULL
  AND T1."wicket_type" NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field', 'retired out')
  AND T1.prev_wicket IS NOT NULL
  AND T1.prev_wicket NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field', 'retired out')
  AND T1.next_wicket IS NOT NULL
  AND T1.next_wicket NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field', 'retired out')
GROUP BY
  T1."match_id",
  T2."player_name";
question_english: list all hat-tricks taken by a bowler against csk

question: Least overs taken to complete a 200-plus chase in IPL.give the top 5 with teams of that match city and year
query:
WITH FirstInningsScores AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "inning" = 1
  GROUP BY
    "match_id"
  HAVING
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") >= 200
), SecondInningsChase AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    COUNT(CASE WHEN "wides" = 0 AND "noballs" = 0 THEN 1 END) AS legal_balls
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "inning" = 2
  GROUP BY
    "match_id"
)
SELECT
  M."team1",
  M."team2",
  M."city",
  SUBSTR(M."season", 1, 4) AS "year",
  (S."legal_balls" / 6) || '.' || (S."legal_balls" % 6) AS "overs_taken"
FROM "Matches" AS M
JOIN "FirstInningsScores" AS F
  ON M."match_id" = F."match_id"
JOIN "SecondInningsChase" AS S
  ON M."match_id" = S."match_id"
WHERE
  M."match_winner" = (
    SELECT
      "batting_team"
    FROM "Deliveries" AS D
    WHERE
      D."match_id" = M."match_id" AND D."inning" = 2
    LIMIT 1
  )
ORDER BY
  S."legal_balls" ASC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: Least overs taken to complete a 200-plus chase in IPL.give the top 5 with teams of that match city and year

question: list all Successful 200-plus run-chases for RR
query:
WITH FirstInningScores AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "batting_team" AS opponent,
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS first_inning_score
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "inning" = 1
  GROUP BY
    "match_id"
)
SELECT
  T1."season",
  T1."match_date",
  T1."venue",
  T2.opponent,
  T2.first_inning_score + 1 AS target
FROM "Matches" AS T1
INNER JOIN FirstInningScores AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
WHERE
  T1."match_winner" = 'Rajasthan Royals' AND T1."match_winner" != T2.opponent AND T2.first_inning_score >= 200
ORDER BY
  T1."match_date" DESC;
question_english: list all Successful 200-plus run-chases for RR

question: minimum innings taken by a player to score a century since their debut.list the player and the innings taken and the score in the century match
query:
WITH PlayerInnings AS (
  SELECT
    "striker_id",
    "match_id",
    SUM("runs_scored") AS "runs"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  GROUP BY
    "striker_id",
    "match_id"
), RankedInnings AS (
  SELECT
    T1."striker_id",
    T1."runs",
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY T1."striker_id" ORDER BY T2."match_date") AS "inning_number"
  FROM PlayerInnings AS T1
  INNER JOIN "Matches" AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id"
)
SELECT
  T4."player_name",
  T3."inning_number",
  T3."runs"
FROM RankedInnings AS T3
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T4
  ON T3."striker_id" = T4."player_id"
WHERE
  T3."runs" >= 100 AND T3."inning_number" = (
    SELECT
      MIN("inning_number")
    FROM RankedInnings
    WHERE
      "runs" >= 100
  );
question_english: minimum innings taken by a player to score a century since their debut.list the player and the innings taken and the score in the century match

question: highest partnership for any wicket for Rajasthan Royals.give the runs and players involved opposition and the year
query:
WITH PartnershipDetails AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "striker_id",
    "non_striker_id",
    "runs_scored",
    "extra_runs",
    COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN "wicket_type" IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (
      PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning"
      ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number"
      ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING
    ), 0) AS partnership_group_id
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE "batting_team" = 'Rajasthan Royals'
),
PartnershipRuns AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "partnership_group_id",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS total_runs
  FROM PartnershipDetails
  GROUP BY "match_id", "inning", "partnership_group_id"
),
PartnershipPlayers AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "partnership_group_id",
    "player_id"
  FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT "match_id", "inning", "partnership_group_id", "striker_id" AS player_id FROM PartnershipDetails
    UNION
    SELECT DISTINCT "match_id", "inning", "partnership_group_id", "non_striker_id" AS player_id FROM PartnershipDetails
  )
),
FullPartnerships AS (
  SELECT
    pr."match_id",
    pr.total_runs,
    GROUP_CONCAT(p."player_name", ', ') AS players
  FROM PartnershipRuns AS pr
  JOIN PartnershipPlayers AS pp
    ON pr."match_id" = pp."match_id"
    AND pr."inning" = pp."inning"
    AND pr."partnership_group_id" = pp."partnership_group_id"
  JOIN "Players" AS p
    ON pp.player_id = p."player_id"
  GROUP BY
    pr."match_id",
    pr."inning",
    pr."partnership_group_id",
    pr.total_runs
  HAVING COUNT(pp.player_id) >= 2
)
SELECT
  fp.total_runs AS "runs",
  fp.players AS "players_involved",
  CASE
    WHEN m."team1" = 'Rajasthan Royals' THEN m."team2"
    ELSE m."team1"
  END AS "opposition",
  m."season" AS "year"
FROM FullPartnerships AS fp
JOIN "Matches" AS m
  ON fp."match_id" = m."match_id"
ORDER BY
  fp.total_runs DESC
LIMIT 1;
question_english: highest partnership for any wicket for Rajasthan Royals.give the runs and players involved opposition and the year

question: 4 Fastest IPL 100s (by balls).give the player runs self and opposition team city and year
query:
WITH PlayerInnings AS (
  SELECT
    "striker_id",
    "match_id",
    SUM("runs_scored") AS total_runs
  FROM "Deliveries"
  GROUP BY
    "striker_id",
    "match_id"
  HAVING
    SUM("runs_scored") >= 100
), CumulativeInnings AS (
  SELECT
    T1."match_id",
    T1."striker_id",
    T1."bowling_team",
    SUM(T1."runs_scored") OVER (PARTITION BY T1."match_id", T1."striker_id" ORDER BY T1."over_number", T1."ball_number") AS cumulative_runs,
    SUM(CASE WHEN T1."wides" = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY T1."match_id", T1."striker_id" ORDER BY T1."over_number", T1."ball_number") AS balls_faced
  FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
  INNER JOIN PlayerInnings AS T2
    ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" AND T1."striker_id" = T2."striker_id"
), BallsTo100 AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "striker_id",
    "bowling_team",
    balls_faced,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "striker_id" ORDER BY balls_faced) AS rn
  FROM CumulativeInnings
  WHERE
    cumulative_runs >= 100
)
SELECT
  T4."player_name",
  T2.total_runs,
  T1.balls_faced,
  T1."bowling_team",
  T3."city",
  T3."season"
FROM BallsTo100 AS T1
JOIN PlayerInnings AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" AND T1."striker_id" = T2."striker_id"
JOIN "Matches" AS T3
  ON T1."match_id" = T3."match_id"
JOIN "Players" AS T4
  ON T1."striker_id" = T4."player_id"
WHERE
  T1.rn = 1
ORDER BY
  T1.balls_faced ASC
LIMIT 4;
question_english: 4 Fastest IPL 100s (by balls).give the player runs self and opposition team city and year
question_hindi_1: *IPL के 4 सबसे तेज़ शतक (गेंदों के हिसाब से)। खिलाड़ी का नाम, बनाए गए रन, विपक्षी टीम, शहर और साल बताएं।**

question: list all instances for fastest team 100 for rr.list the opposition and the year and the overs taken for the 100
query:
WITH MatchProgress AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "bowling_team",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS "cumulative_runs",
    SUM(CASE WHEN "wides" = 0 AND "noballs" = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS "legal_deliveries_faced"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "batting_team" = 'Rajasthan Royals'
), FirstToHundred AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "bowling_team",
    MIN("legal_deliveries_faced") AS "balls_to_100"
  FROM MatchProgress
  WHERE
    "cumulative_runs" >= 100
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "bowling_team"
)
SELECT
  T2."bowling_team" AS "opposition",
  T3."season" AS "year",
  (T2."balls_to_100" / 6) || '.' || (T2."balls_to_100" % 6) AS "overs_taken"
FROM FirstToHundred AS T2
JOIN "Matches" AS T3
  ON T2."match_id" = T3."match_id"
WHERE
  T2."balls_to_100" = (
    SELECT
      MIN("balls_to_100")
    FROM FirstToHundred
  );
question_english: list all instances for fastest team 100 for rr.list the opposition and the year and the overs taken for the 100
question_hindi_1: RR के सबसे तेज़ 100 रनों की सूची दें। हर मैच के लिए विपक्षी टीम, साल, और 100 रन बनाने में लगे ओवर भी बताएं।
question_telugu_1: RR అన్నిటికన్నా వేగంగా ఏ ఉదారహణాలలో 100 పరుగులు సంపాదించింది? ప్రతి మ్యాచ్ కోసం వ్యతిరేకమైన టీం, సంవత్సరం మరియు 100 పరుగులు సంపాదించడానికి ఓవర్లు రాయండి.
question_punjabi: RR ਲਈ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਤੇਜ਼ ਟੀਮ 100 ਰਨ ਦੇ ਸਾਰੇ ਮੌਕਿਆਂ ਦੀ ਸੂਚੀ ਦਿਓ। ਵਿਰੋਧੀ ਟੀਮ, ਸਾਲ ਅਤੇ 100 ਰਨ ਲਈ ਲਏ ਗਏ ਓਵਰਾਂ ਦੀ ਜਾਣਕਾਰੀ ਦਿਓ ।

question: which top 5 overs saw the most runs scored in them in ipl 2025.give the over, runs scored in it, average runs per over, wickets fallen
query: SELECT T1.over_number, SUM(T1.runs_scored + T1.extra_runs) AS total_runs, CAST(SUM(T1.runs_scored + T1.extra_runs) AS REAL) / COUNT(DISTINCT T1.match_id || T1.inning) AS avg_runs_per_over, COUNT(T1.wicket_type) AS wickets_fallen FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Matches AS T2 ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id WHERE T2.season = '2025' GROUP BY T1.over_number ORDER BY total_runs DESC LIMIT 5
question_english: which top 5 overs saw the most runs scored in them in ipl 2025.give the over, runs scored in it, average runs per over, wickets fallen
question_hindi_1: IPL 2025 के उन टॉप 5 ओवरों की सूची दें जिनमें सबसे ज़्यादा रन बने। हर ओवर के लिए बताएं: ओवर, उसमें बने रन, प्रति ओवर औसत रन, और गिरे हुए विकेट।
question_telugu_1: IPL 2025 లో ఏ టాప్ 5 ఓవర్లలో అన్నిటికన్నా ఎక్కువ పరుగులు ఉన్నాయి? ఓవర్, ఓవర్లో సంపాదించిన పరుగులు, ఓవర్ యొక్క ఆవెరేజ్ పరుగులు మరియు పడిన వికెట్ల సంఖ్య రాయండి.
question_punjabi: IPL 2025 ਵਿੱਚ ਕਿਹੜੇ ਚੋਟੀ ਦੇ 5 ਓਵਰਾਂ ਵਿੱਚ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵੱਧ ਰਨ ਬਣੇ| ਓਵਰ, ਉਸ ਵਿੱਚ ਬਣੇ ਰਨ, ਪ੍ਰਤੀ ਓਵਰ ਔਸਤ ਰਨ ਅਤੇ ਡਿੱਗੀਆਂ ਵਿਕਟਾਂ ਦੀ ਜਾਣਕਾਰੀ ਦਿਓ ।

question: which 5 bowler had the worst economy in powerplay in ipl 2025.out of those who bowled atleast 10 overs.give name and economy.
query: SELECT T3."player_name", CAST(SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."wides" + T1."noballs") AS REAL) * 6.0 / COUNT(CASE WHEN T1."wides" = 0 AND T1."noballs" = 0 THEN 1 END) AS "economy" FROM Deliveries AS T1 INNER JOIN Matches AS T2 ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" INNER JOIN Players AS T3 ON T1."bowler_id" = T3."player_id" WHERE T2."season" = '2025' AND T1."over_number" <= 5 GROUP BY T3."player_name" HAVING COUNT(CASE WHEN T1."wides" = 0 AND T1."noballs" = 0 THEN 1 END) >= 60 ORDER BY "economy" DESC LIMIT 5
question_english: which 5 bowler had the worst economy in powerplay in ipl 2025.out of those who bowled atleast 10 overs.give name and economy.

question_telugu_1: IPL 2025 యొక్క పవర్ప్లేలో కనీసం 10 ఓవర్లు వేసిన బౌలర్లలో అన్నిటికన్నా తక్కువ ఎకానమీ ఉన్న 5 బౌలర్ల పేర్లు మరియు ఎకానమీ రాయండి.

question_punjabi: IPL 2025 ਦੇ ਪਾਵਰਪਲੇ ਵਿੱਚ ਕਿਹੜੇ 5 ਗੇਂਦਬਾਜ਼ਾਂ ਦਾ ਇਕਾਨਮੀ ਰੇਟ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਖਰਾਬ ਰਿਹਾ (ਜਿਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਨੇ ਘੱਟੋ-ਘੱਟ 10 ਓਵਰ ਸੁੱਟੇ ਹੋਣ)। ਨਾਮ ਅਤੇ ਇਕਾਨਮੀ ਰੇਟ ਦੱਸੋ।

question: which 4 players had Best batting average vs a team in IPL (min 500 runs).give the average, runs, the opponent and the player
query:
WITH PlayerAverages AS (
  SELECT
    T2."player_name",
    T1."bowling_team",
    SUM(T1."runs_scored") AS total_runs,
    SUM(T1."runs_scored") * 1.0 / COUNT(CASE WHEN T1."player_out_id" = T1."striker_id" AND T1."wicket_type" NOT IN ('retired hurt', 'obstructing the field') THEN 1 END) AS batting_average
  FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
  JOIN "Players" AS T2
    ON T1."striker_id" = T2."player_id"
  GROUP BY
    T1."striker_id",
    T1."bowling_team"
  HAVING
    SUM(T1."runs_scored") >= 500
    AND COUNT(CASE WHEN T1."player_out_id" = T1."striker_id" AND T1."wicket_type" NOT IN ('retired hurt', 'obstructing the field') THEN 1 END) > 0
)
SELECT
  "player_name",
  "bowling_team" AS "opponent",
  total_runs,
  batting_average
FROM PlayerAverages
WHERE batting_average >= (
  SELECT batting_average
  FROM PlayerAverages
  ORDER BY batting_average DESC
  LIMIT 1 OFFSET 3
)
ORDER BY batting_average DESC;
question_english: which 4 players had Best batting average vs a team in IPL (min 500 runs).give the average, runs, the opponent and the player
question_hindi_1: IPL में किसी एक टीम के खिलाफ किन 4 खिलाड़ियों का बल्लेबाजी औसत सर्वश्रेष्ठ है (न्यूनतम 500 रन)? खिलाड़ी का नाम, औसत, रन और विपक्षी टीम बताएं।
question_telugu_1: IPL లో ఒక టీం కి వ్యతిరేకంగా ఏ 4 క్రీడాకార్ల బ్యాటింగ్ అన్నిటికన్నా మంచిది (కనీసం 500 పరుగులు)? క్రీడాకారి పేరు, ఆవెరేజ్, పరుగులు మరియు వ్యతిరేకమైన టీం రాయండి.
question_punjabi: IPL ਵਿੱਚ ਕਿਸੇ ਟੀਮ ਦੇ ਖਿਲਾਫ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਵਧੀਆ ਬੱਲੇਬਾਜ਼ੀ ਔਸਤ ਰੱਖਣ ਵਾਲੇ 4 ਖਿਡਾਰੀ (ਘੱਟੋ-ਘੱਟ 500 ਰਨ)। ਔਸਤ, ਰਨ, ਵਿਰੋਧੀ ਟੀਮ ਅਤੇ ਖਿਡਾਰੀ ਦੀ ਜਾਣਕਾਰੀ ਦਿਓ ।

question: 10 bowlers with Most wickets in the IPL
query:
SELECT
  T2."player_name",
  COUNT(T1."delivery_id") AS "total_wickets"
FROM Deliveries AS T1
INNER JOIN Players AS T2
  ON T1."bowler_id" = T2."player_id"
WHERE
  T1."wicket_type" IS NOT NULL AND T1."wicket_type" NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field', 'retired out')
GROUP BY
  T2."player_name"
ORDER BY
  "total_wickets" DESC
LIMIT 10;
question_english: 10 bowlers with Most wickets in the IPL
question_hindi_1: IPL में सबसे ज़्यादा विकेट लेने वाले 10 गेंदबाज़

question: the 4 best figures for a bowler against lsg
query:
SELECT
  T2."player_name",
  SUM(CASE WHEN T1."wicket_type" IS NOT NULL AND T1."wicket_type" NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field', 'retired out') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "wickets",
  SUM(T1."runs_scored" + T1."wides" + T1."noballs") AS "runs_conceded"
FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T2
  ON T1."bowler_id" = T2."player_id"
WHERE
  T1."batting_team" = 'Lucknow Super Giants'
GROUP BY
  T1."match_id",
  T2."player_name"
HAVING
  SUM(CASE WHEN T1."wicket_type" IS NOT NULL AND T1."wicket_type" NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field', 'retired out') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0
ORDER BY
  "wickets" DESC,
  "runs_conceded" ASC
LIMIT 4;
question_english: the 4 best figures for a bowler against lsg
question_hindi_1: LSG के खिलाफ़ किसी गेंदबाज़ के 4 सर्वश्रेष्ठ आंकड़े

question: sa yadav's batting stats in mumbai.mention innings, runs,average,strike rate.
query: SELECT T3."player_name", COUNT(DISTINCT T1."match_id") AS "innings", SUM(T2."runs_scored") AS "runs", CAST(SUM(T2."runs_scored") AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(CASE WHEN T2."wides" = 0 THEN 1 END) AS "strike_rate", CAST(SUM(T2."runs_scored") AS REAL) / COUNT(CASE WHEN T2."player_out_id" = T3."player_id" THEN 1 END) AS "average" FROM Matches AS T1 INNER JOIN Deliveries AS T2 ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" INNER JOIN Players AS T3 ON T2."striker_id" = T3."player_id" WHERE T1."city" = 'Mumbai' AND T3."player_name" = 'SA Yadav' GROUP BY T3."player_name"

question: which bowler has the most wickets in the 1st ball of the innings.mention the bowler and the players he has dismissed in those balls
query:
WITH WicketCounts AS (
  SELECT
    "bowler_id",
    COUNT(*) AS WicketCount
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "over_number" = 0
    AND "ball_number" = 1
    AND "wicket_type" IS NOT NULL
    AND "wicket_type" NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field', 'retired out')
  GROUP BY
    "bowler_id"
), TopBowlers AS (
  SELECT
    "bowler_id"
  FROM WicketCounts
  WHERE
    WicketCount = (
      SELECT
        MAX(WicketCount)
      FROM WicketCounts
    )
)
SELECT
  T3."player_name",
  T4."player_name"
FROM "Deliveries" AS T1
INNER JOIN TopBowlers AS T2
  ON T1."bowler_id" = T2."bowler_id"
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T3
  ON T1."bowler_id" = T3."player_id"
INNER JOIN "Players" AS T4
  ON T1."player_out_id" = T4."player_id"
WHERE
  T1."over_number" = 0
  AND T1."ball_number" = 1
  AND T1."wicket_type" IS NOT NULL
  AND T1."wicket_type" NOT IN ('run out', 'retired hurt', 'obstructing the field', 'retired out');
question_english: which bowler has the most wickets in the 1st ball of the innings.mention the bowler and the players he has dismissed in those balls

question: the 5 players with least strike rate to face 100+ balls in ipl 2025.mention the player, runs, balls, strike rate.
query:
SELECT
  T2.player_name,
  SUM(T1.runs_scored) AS runs,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.wides = 0 THEN 1 END) AS balls_faced,
  SUM(T1.runs_scored) * 100.0 / COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.wides = 0 THEN 1 END) AS strike_rate
FROM Deliveries AS T1
INNER JOIN Players AS T2
  ON T1.striker_id = T2.player_id
INNER JOIN Matches AS T3
  ON T1.match_id = T3.match_id
WHERE
  T3.season = '2025'
GROUP BY
  T2.player_name
HAVING
  COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.wides = 0 THEN 1 END) >= 100
ORDER BY
  strike_rate
LIMIT 5;
question_english: the 5 players with least strike rate to face 100+ balls in ipl 2025.mention the player, runs, balls, strike rate.

question: all instances of 140-plus totals after being 4 down for less than 15 in IPL.give score after 4 wickets down and then the final score and the team
query:
WITH InningProgress AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "batting_team",
    "over_number",
    "ball_number",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS cumulative_runs,
    SUM(CASE WHEN "player_out_id" IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS cumulative_wickets
  FROM "Deliveries"
), FourthWicketFall AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    "batting_team",
    "cumulative_runs" AS score_at_4_wickets
  FROM (
    SELECT
      *,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY "match_id", "inning" ORDER BY "over_number", "ball_number") AS rn
    FROM InningProgress
    WHERE
      "cumulative_wickets" = 4
  )
  WHERE
    rn = 1
), FinalScores AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS final_score
  FROM "Deliveries"
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "inning"
)
SELECT
  T1."batting_team",
  T1."score_at_4_wickets",
  T2."final_score"
FROM FourthWicketFall AS T1
JOIN FinalScores AS T2
  ON T1."match_id" = T2."match_id" AND T1."inning" = T2."inning"
WHERE
  T1."score_at_4_wickets" < 15 AND T2."final_score" >= 140;
question_english: all instances of 140-plus totals after being 4 down for less than 15 in IPL.give score after 4 wickets down and then the final score and the team
question_hindi_1: IPL में ऐसे सभी मैचों की जानकारी दें, जिनमें किसी टीम ने 15 रन से कम पर 4 विकेट खोने के बाद 140 से ज़्यादा का स्कोर बनाया हो। 4 विकेट गिरने के समय का स्कोर, अंतिम स्कोर और टीम का नाम भी बताएं।

question_punjabi: IPL ਵਿੱਚ 15 ਤੋਂ ਘੱਟ ਰਨ 'ਤੇ 4 ਵਿਕਟਾਂ ਡਿੱਗਣ ਤੋਂ ਬਾਅਦ 140+ ਸਕੋਰ ਬਣਾਉਣ ਦੇ ਸਾਰੇ ਮੌਕੇ। 4 ਵਿਕਟਾਂ ਡਿੱਗਣ ਤੋਂ ਬਾਅਦ ਦਾ ਸਕੋਰ, ਫਿਰ ਅੰਤਿਮ ਸਕੋਰ ਅਤੇ ਟੀਮ ਦੀ ਜਾਣਕਾਰੀ ਦਿਓ ।

question: 5 lowest Lowest PP scores for SRH that were played for complete 20 overs. give score wickets city and year
query:
WITH FullInnings AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    (
      CASE
        WHEN "batting_team" IN ('Deccan Chargers', 'Sunrisers Hyderabad')
        THEN 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'
        ELSE "batting_team"
      END
    ) = 'Sunrisers Hyderabad'
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "inning"
  HAVING
    MAX("over_number") >= 19
), PowerplayStats AS (
  SELECT
    "match_id",
    "inning",
    SUM("runs_scored" + "extra_runs") AS score,
    COUNT("player_out_id") AS wickets
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "over_number" <= 5
  GROUP BY
    "match_id",
    "inning"
)
SELECT
  T2.score,
  T2.wickets,
  T1.city,
  T1.season AS year
FROM "Matches" AS T1
INNER JOIN PowerplayStats AS T2
  ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id
INNER JOIN FullInnings AS T3
  ON T2.match_id = T3.match_id
  AND T2.inning = T3.inning
ORDER BY
  T2.score ASC
LIMIT 5;
question_english: 5 lowest Lowest PP scores for SRH that were played for complete 20 overs. give score wickets city and year

question: list all 100+ partnerships in mi vs csk matches.
query:
WITH PartnershipDetails AS (
  SELECT
    T1.match_id,
    T1.inning,
    T1.over_number,
    T1.ball_number,
    MIN(T1.striker_id, T1.non_striker_id) AS p1_id,
    MAX(T1.striker_id, T1.non_striker_id) AS p2_id,
    T1.runs_scored + T1.extra_runs AS total_runs
  FROM Deliveries AS T1
  INNER JOIN Matches AS T2
    ON T1.match_id = T2.match_id
  WHERE
    (
      T2.team1 = 'Mumbai Indians' AND T2.team2 = 'Chennai Super Kings'
    ) OR (
      T2.team1 = 'Chennai Super Kings' AND T2.team2 = 'Mumbai Indians'
    )
), PartnershipChange AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    CASE
      WHEN p1_id != LAG(p1_id, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY match_id, inning ORDER BY over_number, ball_number) OR p2_id != LAG(p2_id, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY match_id, inning ORDER BY over_number, ball_number)
      THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END AS is_new_partnership
  FROM PartnershipDetails
), PartnershipGroup AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    SUM(is_new_partnership) OVER (PARTITION BY match_id, inning ORDER BY over_number, ball_number) AS partnership_id
  FROM PartnershipChange
)
SELECT
  T4.player_name,
  T5.player_name,
  SUM(T3.total_runs) AS partnership_runs
FROM PartnershipGroup AS T3
INNER JOIN Players AS T4
  ON T3.p1_id = T4.player_id
INNER JOIN Players AS T5
  ON T3.p2_id = T5.player_id
GROUP BY
  T3.match_id,
  T3.inning,
  T3.partnership_id,
  T4.player_name,
  T5.player_name
HAVING
  partnership_runs >= 100
ORDER BY
  partnership_runs DESC;
question_english: list all 100+ partnerships in mi vs csk matches.
question_hindi_1: MI बनाम CSK मैचों में हुई 100+ रनों की सभी साझेदारियों की सूची दें।
question_telugu_1: MI vs CSK మ్యాచులలో 100+ పరుగుల అన్నీ భాగస్వామ్యాలు ఏమిటి?

question: 4 players with Most 50+ scores against CSK in IPL
query:
SELECT
  T2."player_name",
  COUNT(T1."striker_id") AS "fifty_plus_count"
FROM (
  SELECT
    "striker_id"
  FROM "Deliveries"
  WHERE
    "bowling_team" = 'Chennai Super Kings'
  GROUP BY
    "striker_id",
    "match_id"
  HAVING
    SUM("runs_scored") >= 50
) AS T1
JOIN "Players" AS T2
  ON T1."striker_id" = T2."player_id"
GROUP BY
  T2."player_name"
ORDER BY
  "fifty_plus_count" DESC
LIMIT 4;
question_english: 4 players with Most 50+ scores against CSK in IPL
